The BBC is aims to be a totally impartial public service broadcaster, and was established by Royal Charter. The BBC is funded by a licence fee paid by British households, and is regulated by Ofcom. They aim to create high-quality content, in order to inform and educate, but also entertain, their audience Millions of people from all over the world watch content produced by the BBC, and they are well respected as a media company. It was founded in 1922, with its headquarters in Westminster, London.

programme.title: The Travel Show
programme.desc: Join the Travel Show team as they take you on a criss-cross journey across the globe, visiting the most popular holiday destinations as well as sampling some hidden gems. The itinerary includes up-and-coming hot spots for holidaymakers and uncovering some lesser-known facts about places on many peoples bucket lists. This BBC programme takes you to every corner of the planet, providing an all-round insight into the world of travel. From winter wonderland activities such as eco skiing in Denmark and trekking across glaciers in Iceland, to warmer destinations as diverse as Rwanda and the Great Barrier Reef in Australia, your adventure starts here.

programme.desc: Alasdair Keane explores a high-tech studio that transforms how car stunts are made.

programme.title: Inside Museums
programme.desc: Inside Museums offers a chance to have a look at have a look at the amazing collections of museums and galleries across the United Kingdom during the Covid-19 pandemic from the comfort of your own home. The series provides four special access visits to Scottish National Gallery in Edinburgh, Ulster Museum in Belfast, St Fagans National Museum of History in Cardiff and Artemisia Gentileschi blockbuster exhibition at the National Gallery in London.

programme.title: Talking Business
programme.desc: On Talking Business BBC presenters, based in the worlds most dynamic cities, discuss with the most important and influential people from the world of business and finance, the key issues of the day. Corporate leaders, global investors, top creatives, cutting-edge entrepreneurs and leading intellectuals gather together weekly to discuss and analyse the issues and trends that most affect how business has to work in todays world. Our team of presenters are experts on the issues and developments which are shaping the way we work, consume and live in the 21st Century.

programme.title: Newsday
programme.desc: "Good Morning Asia, hello World." Join the news teams from BBC World News in London and Singapore. This live news and current affairs program is broadcast globally and focuses on all the latest news and breaking developing stories that matter around the world. The show is usually presented by Rico Hizon in Singapore and Kasia Madera in London. Broadcasting live at midnight GMT on both BBC World News and the BBC News channel, the show is broadcast in the morning in Asia and therefore is marketed as a morning show for people watching around the country. The show is often followed by Asia Business Report live from Singapore which reports on all the latest economy and business figures from the country.

programme.title: Business Today
programme.desc: The latest business news from Singapore and around the world.

programme.desc: A round-up of the days sporting action.

programme.title: Секрет майя
programme.desc: Наташа считает себя виновной в смерти супруга. Он погиб в ДТП, не сумев справиться с управлением. Незадолго до несчастного случая пара эмоционально выясняла отношения. Именно из-за этого муж Наташи в сердцах сел за руль.

programme.title: Секрет майя
programme.desc: Наташа сталкивается с предательством друзей. Кроме того, ее прессуют братки. Она с ужасом выясняет о своем супруге много нового. У мужчины была другая фамилия и семья, о которой Наташа ничего не знала.

programme.title: Секрет майя
programme.desc: Наташе становится известно, что Тома ждет ребенка от Игоря. Отец пытается ее утешить. Он заверяет девушку, что она поедет во Францию. В это время Игорь пытается доехать до города. Он слишком долго пробыл в доме Томы.

programme.title: Секрет майя
programme.desc: Тамара солгала Наталье о своей беременности. К утру Игорь все-таки доезжает до дома возлюбленной. Ему открывает двери ее отец. Он сообщает, что Наташа находится на пути в аэропорт. Игорь намерен догнать ее.

programme.title: Почта
programme.desc: В почтовое отделение на должность экспедитора устраивается Елена (40 лет). Экспедитор Андрей (45) не очень доволен новой напарницей, он не доверяет женщинам за рулем. Но со временем между Еленой и Андреем возникает симпатия. И не без стараний со стороны их детей – Юли и Глеба. Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Colossus: Gumball and Darwin learn that it isnt wise to upset Hector Elmores resident Giant. / The Knights: Gumball and Tobias compete for Pennys affection by putting on the lamest duel in history. / The Remote: The Wattersons battle for possession of the TV remote gets dirty. / The Fridge: When Mom discovers Gumball has no ambition she is determined to turn him into a winner. / Gumball seeks justice when Banana Joe chews Darwins pen. / Gumball is determined to drive Penny away from Leslie / Darwin develops a texting addiction when he and Gumball get their first cell phone. / Richard gets a job as a pizza delivery man which worries Nicole when at the same time strange things begin to occur around the neighbourhood. / Gumball Darwin and Anais search for the Watterson family treasure.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput takes refuge in a fancy hotel. Specs and Skinny bluff their way past the doorman by acting like they come from the expensive side of the tracks. Spoiler: they dont. The honeymoon suite is like nothing theyve ever seen; the Docs sheen of respectability quickly evaporates when theres robes to wear and beds to jump on. Their taste of the good life doesnt last long, though; another Lamput chase results in a proper trashed hotel room, just like you read about. Then downstairs for some à la carte chaos in the hotel restaurant. Its bad news for the Docs when the tab comes due; a Lab wage wont cover these extras.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: "When Alan ditches Gumball to do something more fun Gumball is desperate to track him down and make him pay for his betrayal. Gumball has through gritted teeth prepared a special dinner for Alan to apologise for the way he has treated him in the past. When Alan cancels he is overjoyed until a post on Elmore Plus reveals Alan lied about his Mom being sick and is having a day of fun with his family instead. Gumball tracks down the traitor to give him a piece of his mind but when he finds out his Mom really is sick he has to find a way to make it up to him.

Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Gumball wants to get Richard on the cheerleading team in order to end their familys generational trauma.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: The Wattersons must get Anais to Daisyland before the park closes for good.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The kids try to help Dad bond with Frankie. / When the uncomfortableness between them reaches new levels Gumball and Hot Dog Guy decide they have to confront their ongoing awkwardness by making things as awkward as possible. / The kids realise that theyve never known their neighbours name, and theyre way past the window where they can ask. / Gumball has something uncomfortable to tell Penny but doesnt know how, until he makes a deal with Principal Brown. / Gumball and Anais go head to head in a leadership election voted for by their classmates. / Clayton realises he can imitate his classmates, and begins stealing the lives of the people of Elmore. / When unexpected couples in the world of Elmore start randomly falling in love, Gumball and Darwin have to figure out whats going on. / Gumball questions Mr Smalls eco-friendly commitment, causing him to abandon society and live in the forest. Director: Mic Graves.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Craig and his two best friends, Kelsey and JP, are always going on adventures in the untamed suburban wilderness known as the Creek - a kid utopia where tribes of children rule over tree forts and bike ramps, making up an entire kid society. Each episode finds the kids either venturing into unexplored areas of the Creek, encountering new Creek Kids, or just getting into trouble at their hang out - the Stump.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven continue the fun in season seven of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero ... once the cape comes off. Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy - based upon DC characters - focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin starts working at an ice cream shop to get revenge on Jokers Gelato for denying him a free birthday scoop. / The Tower is in lockdown and supplies are being gathered, as the Titans prepare for Doomsday. / The Titans negative behavior is giving superheroes a bad name, so they must learn proper conduct to be good role models for kids. / Robin finally experiences drip, a magical coolness that comes from wearing sneakers, and soon seeks out the ultimate pair.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Darwin asks Gumball to teach him how to skate Gumball makes sure that he covers every aspect of the skating lifestyle - from wearing the right gear using the right terms and choosing the right board. But when Darwin finally gets his wheels rolling he realises there might be one important aspect of skating that Gumball hasnt taught him...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons discover a family of cartoon copycats who mimic their every move. / Grandpa Louie has a new online friend - the only problem is she isnt real. / The kids find out that Richard has been being picked on by the same person since high school. / Gumball and Darwin decide to use online reviews to wrangle free stuff. / A mysterious package shows up at the Wattersons house and they do their best to avoid opening it. / Darwin likes a girl in his class so Gumball decides its time to play cupid. / Gumballs smart answers arent the correct ones and hes forced to go back to kindergarten. / Gumball and Darwin discover the real reason Dads diet wasnt working. / Gumball discovers that Rob his old nemesis is neme-seeing someone else now.

programme.title: Bunnicula
programme.desc: Once upon a time an extraordinary bunny is born in an average family of bunnies. The little guy looks just like a vampire- he has sharp fangs, his ears remind of bat wings and plus he is scared of sunlight. Bunnicula is never out in daylight, sleeps in a coffin, flies with bat wings, and drains juice from vegetables with his fangs which gives him enormous power. His family is afraid that he will attack somebody so they lock him in an old mansion. Bunnicula has been sleeping for many years until a little girl Mina unlocks hims and makes him a new member of her family. Her dog named Harold makes friends with Bunnicula straight away but the cat Chester is a little bit scared of him and does not seem to be happy about a new pet.

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: Follow the daily adventures of a 10-year-old boy named Clarence, and his two best friends Sumo and Jeff. Clarence lives with his mother Mary and her boyfriend Chad in the fictional town of Aberdale, and he is optimistic, curious, honest and quirky boy, who sees the best in everyone and gets himself in a variety of funny situations and everyday problems, which he solves with lots of imagination and with the help from his friends.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Feeling unappreciated by her family, Nicole strikes up a friendship with a sympathetic AI. As their relationship intensifies, the AI tries to drive a wedge between Nicole and the other Wattersons.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Richard must retrace the memories of his day in order to figure out what "the thing" is, so Nicoles family dinner with Granny Jo Jo wont be another epic failure.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Each member of the family thinks their demographic has it the toughest. Gumball and Darwin think guys have it the worst. Mom thinks women do. Anais thinks kids do. And Dad thinks that grown-ups do. They decide the only way to figure it out is to spend a day in each others shoes, no matter if theyre too-small, too-big, or high-heeled.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! Camp Scare
programme.desc: Welcome to Camp Little Moose, where the counselors are friendly, the activities are endless and the urban legends are intense. In fact, every time someone tells a ghost story, the creepy creature comes to life! Luckily, the Mystery Inc. gang doesnt spook that easily, so gather round the campfire to roast some bad guys. Fred is excited to return to his childhood camp as a counselor to mentor young kids and serve as a role model. But when Fred, Velma, Daphne, Shaggy and Scooby-Doo arrive, the camp has just been shut down due to the appearance of the Woodsman, a ghostly figure whos straight out of camp folklore.

At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: Adventure Time
programme.desc: Adventure Time is an American fantasy animated television series that shows a 12-year-old boy Finn and his best friend, a wise 28-year-old (in dog years) dog Jake with magical powers living in Lands of Ooo in post-apocalyptic world. They lean on each other during good and bad times, trust each another with secrets and look to each other for advice. Finn likes to travel and save princesses from evil monsters in Lands of Ooo. Jake is more than his friend, he is his mentor, and his extraordinary skills help the boy to fight evil. Finn and Jake hang out with Princess Bubblegum, the sovereign of the Candy Kingdom, the fearsome Ice King, an ice wizard, Marceline the Vampire Queen, a 1000-year-old vampire and rock musician and many more.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons run over Santa Claus and must save Christmas. / Gumball and Darwin receive an heirloom from Richard but lose it. / Bobert loses a bet to Gumball so has to obey him for 24 hours. / Gumball asks Idaho to teach his family to live a simpler life. / Gumball teaches Darwin a lesson after Darwin leaves him. / Granny JoJos overprotective behavior puts the Wattersons in danger. / Gumball thinks Teri is way too scared of germs. / Gumball and Darwin rent a film called A Ponys Tail to watch with Anais but keep getting distracted on their way home. / Gumball destroys Alan and Carmens relationship and has to reunite them.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball Darwin and Carrie team up to convince their fellow students that the school is haunted. At Halloween show and tell the class isnt buying Gumballs story about Gargaroth The Devourer until Carrie fakes a terrifying haunting. The kids convince the school to hire them as ghost exterminators and take their payment in Halloween candy. But when it turns out Gargaroth is real suddenly Gumball is expected to be the towns saviour.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball is walking in the same direction as Hot Dog Guy and with each step it becomes increasingly awkward. Gumball is too busy singing about ketchup to notice hes about to bump into Hot Dog Guy. They manage to get through an awkward moment only to discover theyre travelling in the same direction. Their journey becomes increasingly awkward until a delusional mall cop tries to arrest them and in the process allows them to finally go their separate ways…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Elmore residents are going missing and the cause of these disappearances may be closer to home than Gumball and Darwin think. A breaking news report tells the Wattersons that their neighbour is among the several mysterious disappearances happening across Elmore. Their search for clues leads them to find a strange egg which they soon discover belongs to their own Evil Turtle. The family realise that its their responsibility to track down their pet before she and her brood do more damage to the town.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin agree to do all of Tobiass chores in exchange for good points! Gumball and Darwin discover that Tobias is doing way better than them in an online game called Galatrek. Tobias admits he earns "good points" doing chores for his parents which he then exchanges for dollars to buy cool stuff for Galatrek. If Gumball and Darwin do Tobias chores they can earn his "good points" and use them for Galatrek. Gumball and Darwin think theyve hit the jackpot. But these "good points" may not be quite as good as Tobias claims...

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs go out en masse to catch Lamput, there is a mishap with a bucket of grey paint, and no-one notices the extra Doc on the van-ride back to the Lab. Lamput-in-disguise is overwhelmed by the scale of the Labs operations - but soon enough proves to be pretty sharp at this Doc business. To catch a Lamput, youve gotta think like a Lamput, see. Lamputs so good at science-ing that soon enough poor old Specs and Skinny are sacked with extreme prejudice. Lamput cant stand watching his old buddies kicked out on the street. If only folks would believe the newest Doc: under this grey exterior, there beats a heart as orange as orange can be.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Nicole arranges a playdate for Anais with the son of a classy lady she met at the supermarket. / Richard has lost all of the familys money. Nicole is happy for the Wattersons to appear in a Joyful Burger commercial for some much needed cash. / Darwin joins the school marching band and his tin-whistle talent lands him the solo. / Rob creates a variety of spinoff Elmore shows and formats in order to replace Gumball.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Craig and his two best friends, Kelsey and JP, are always going on adventures in the untamed suburban wilderness known as the Creek - a kid utopia where tribes of children rule over tree forts and bike ramps, making up an entire kid society. Each episode finds the kids either venturing into unexplored areas of the Creek, encountering new Creek Kids, or just getting into trouble at their hang out - the Stump.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven continue the fun in season seven of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero ... once the cape comes off. Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy - based upon DC characters - focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons complain about their day and order a pizza from Larry... / The citizens of Elmore are feeling down because its January, so Gumball and Anais invent a new holiday called Sluzzle Tag. / In Biology class, Gumball and Darwin are waiting for a butterfly to emerge from its chrysalis. / After Gumball and Darwin have too much sugary cereal they begin thinking about the mysteries of the universe. / Gumball, Darwin and Anais discover that Banana Joes mom paints pictures which predict the future. / When Mr Small shows a health and safety video in class, Darwin becomes obsessed with the idea of keeping the Wattersons safe. / Anais throws a party but no-one shows up as she has no friends or social skills. / Alan is so good-natured that Gumball feels compelled to make him lose his temper. / Things arent going Gumballs way at school so he assumes there must be a Secret Society...

programme.title: Bunnicula
programme.desc: Once upon a time an extraordinary bunny is born in an average family of bunnies. The little guy looks just like a vampire- he has sharp fangs, his ears remind of bat wings and plus he is scared of sunlight. Bunnicula is never out in daylight, sleeps in a coffin, flies with bat wings, and drains juice from vegetables with his fangs which gives him enormous power. His family is afraid that he will attack somebody so they lock him in an old mansion. Bunnicula has been sleeping for many years until a little girl Mina unlocks hims and makes him a new member of her family. Her dog named Harold makes friends with Bunnicula straight away but the cat Chester is a little bit scared of him and does not seem to be happy about a new pet.

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: Follow the daily adventures of a 10-year-old boy named Clarence, and his two best friends Sumo and Jeff. Clarence lives with his mother Mary and her boyfriend Chad in the fictional town of Aberdale, and he is optimistic, curious, honest and quirky boy, who sees the best in everyone and gets himself in a variety of funny situations and everyday problems, which he solves with lots of imagination and with the help from his friends.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! Shaggys Showdown
programme.desc: Join Scooby-doo and the gang for a frightfully wacky ride in this all-new original movie as they visit the Crazy Q Dude Ranch. But before they can strap on their spurs, the ghost of the scallawag outlaw Dapper Jack rides into town to rattle the gang and the other guests. Now, its up to the mystery-loving posse to round up the dreadful critter and save the ranch!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Amazing World of Gumball revolves around the life of Gumball Watterson a 12-year-old cat who attends middle school in the fictional city of Elmore. Accompanied by his adoptive goldfish brother and best friend Darwin he frequently finds himself involved in various shenanigans around the city during which he interacts with his other family members - sister Anais and parents Nicole and Richard - and an extended supporting cast of characters. With relatable themes and a unique cast of characters The Amazing World of Gumball exemplifies the funny amazing sweet and optimistic side of kids everyday life. Injected with a good deal of humor and unpredictable nonsense Gumballs world reflects the modern family and everyday issues that kids understand.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven continue the fun in season seven of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero ... once the cape comes off. Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy - based upon DC characters - focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Richard must retrace the memories of his day in order to figure out what "the thing" is, so Nicoles family dinner with Granny Jo Jo wont be another epic failure.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Gumball must help Principal Brown have body confidence about his butt in order to be allowed to do his poem about butts at the Poetry Recital.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: Adventure Time
programme.desc: Adventure Time is an American fantasy animated television series that shows a 12-year-old boy Finn and his best friend, a wise 28-year-old (in dog years) dog Jake with magical powers living in Lands of Ooo in post-apocalyptic world. They lean on each other during good and bad times, trust each another with secrets and look to each other for advice. Finn likes to travel and save princesses from evil monsters in Lands of Ooo. Jake is more than his friend, he is his mentor, and his extraordinary skills help the boy to fight evil. Finn and Jake hang out with Princess Bubblegum, the sovereign of the Candy Kingdom, the fearsome Ice King, an ice wizard, Marceline the Vampire Queen, a 1000-year-old vampire and rock musician and many more.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Feeling unappreciated by her family, Nicole strikes up a friendship with a sympathetic AI. As their relationship intensifies, the AI tries to drive a wedge between Nicole and the other Wattersons.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball sets out to solve the mystery of who stuffed Principal Brown into his locker. / Gumball and Darwins harmless pranks on Dad spiral hopelessly out of control. / Gumball and Darwins martial arts costumes make them a laughing stock at school. / Gumball is traumatised when accidentally kissed on the mouth by his Grandma JoJo. / Gumball and Darwin are invited to a high school party and have to bring a date! / Gumball and Darwin unsuccessfully attempt to get a refund for their computer game. / Gumball discovers that Bobert is planning to take over his identity and replace him! / Gumball and Darwin barely survive a school picnic in the Forest of Doom. / Gumball sets out to win his Dad back by winning a blindfolded "dumb" race.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin try to get a game back from Tobias but Darwin starts to feel like a sidekick to Gumball and refuses to follow his orders. / Richard overhears Gumball and Darwin making fun of him which hurts his feelings and he has to regain his reputation as a hero. / Gumball tries to look good in the school photo. / Gumball and Darwin get caught in the middle of a trash can war between Richard and Mr. Robinson. / Gumball and Darwin cheat on their maths test get detention and have to escape. / Nicole gets upset with the family at the supermarket when her kids want chocolate but she says no. / The Wattersons must survive a bizarre game of Dodj or Daar through to the end. / Darwin has promised to play video games with Gumball but his promise with Banana Joe interferes.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons must survive a bizarre game of Dodj or Daar through to the end. / Darwin has promised to play video games with Gumball but his promise with Banana Joe interferes. / Gumball and Darwin must apologise to everyone they know after getting a threatening message on Elmore Plus. / Gumball and Darwin try to understand Jukes urgent beatbox message. / Richard is left in charge for the day but his lack of rules attracts unwanted guests to the Watterson house. / Gumball and Darwin fail to make some instant homemade movie classics. / Gumball and Darwins reputation is challenged and they really couldnt care less... / Gumball accidentally uploads a video of himself and wants it gone. / The Watterson kids come up with a fool-proof plan.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Skinny brings home the wrong laundry bag. Not a disaster, as it happens, since this particular laundry bag contains uncanny super-suits that grant mighty powers. The Docs get heat vision, amazing telekinesis rays, magnetic boots, you name it. All perfect for the person who dreams of… doing the household chores. With great power comes great boringness, apparently. After a satisfying day of getting the house spick n span, the penny finally drops for the Super-docs: they realise they have a far higher calling. Is it fighting evil and helping the underdog? Nope, its chasing Lamput, same as usual. Meanwhile, however, two actual superheroes really want their suits back. Turns out these heroes are quite into helping the underdog. Which is good news for Lamput, and very, very bad news for the Docs.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons try and reconnect Darwin to his fish roots. When Mom sees Darwin gazing longingly at a fish-tank she thinks their mammalian lifestyle isnt fulfilling her adopted son and deep down he longs to connect with his fishy roots. So the family try to re-connect him with his aquatic culture; they try fish-food fish-language even fish clothes. But when none of it works they realize they may have to let him go.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Mom sees Darwin gazing longingly at a fish-tank she thinks their mammalian lifestyle isnt fulfilling her adopted son and deep down he longs to connect with his fishy roots. / The Parent Teacher Association of Elmore Junior High bans video games, so the kids try and prove that games arent a bad influence. / Tobias follows every single high-five with a butt-slap so when Gumball doesnt get one he feels insulted. He tries to get Tobias to slap his rear all day but it doesnt work. Director: Mic Graves,.

programme.title: Quest Means Business
programme.desc: Hes not messing around: Richard Quest presents his hot takes on the biggest breaking stories in the world of business. Watch for the expert analysis, commentary and opinions on the important headlines in the field from the notorious English journalist and CNN anchor. Joined by a cast of experts and correspondents delivering unrivaled facts and news, but also features and fascinating takes, figures and analysis on everything going down in the world of business.

programme.title: The Lead with Jake Tapper
programme.desc: News, politics and current affairs programme hosted by the award-winning, American journalist and author, Jake Tapper. Jake Tapper is the chief Washington correspondent for CNN and he will share his knowledge and insight into politics as well as covering a variety of other topics. This programme discusses a range of stories from topical events including national news, economics/finance, sports, health, technology and world affairs. The Lead with Jake Tapper has won a number of awards and accolades including three National Headliner Awards. Outside his work on television, Tapper has written for The New Yorker, The Washington Post and the Los Angeles Times as well as publishing his first novel, a political thriller.

programme.title: World Sport
programme.desc: One of the CNNs longest running programmes that allows viewers to find out all the global sports news, see all the important events and most interesting parts, and enjoy the interviews with sports pundits and various sports stars.

programme.title: The Brief with Jim Sciutto
programme.desc: The best of CNNs reporting from correspondents across the world, to guide global audiences through the fast-paced news cycle with insight, analysis and hard-hitting interviews.

programme.title: Erin Burnett OutFront
programme.desc: Hosted by Erin Burnett, an expert in political science and economics, OutFront is an hour-long news programme examining the latest stories from the US and further afield. Broadcast live from either the New York studio or live on location from the site of a breaking story, the show features insightful opinions from informed guests. With expert analysis from CNNs correspondents and analysis from the shows panel, Erin Burnett OutFront dissects the stories of the day, leaving no stone unturned. Burnett, a former financial analyst for Goldman Sachs, uses her forthright approach to engage interviewees in honest discussion.

programme.title: Anderson Cooper
programme.desc: Anderson Cooper delves into the days news, looking beyond the broadcast to give his take, prompting us to re-think what we hear in the headlines. Cooper has covered major, international stories like the aftermath of Hurricane Katrina on the Gulf Coast, the catastrophic BP oil spill and the 2010 earthquake in Haiti, which saw the whole world fall silent. The show has won an absolute plethora of awards over the years, including GLAAD Media and Emmy awards.

programme.title: The Source with Kaitlan Collins
programme.desc: Kaitlan Collins goes straight to the source for the best reporting on the days biggest stories.

programme.title: CNN NewsNight
programme.desc: Abby Phillip leads a roundtable discussion on the days biggest stories and issues shaping our world.

programme.title: Laura Coates Live
programme.desc: Laura Coates goes inside the story with a relentless pursuit of the facts.

programme.title: CNN Newsroom
programme.desc: CNN Newroom provides the most up to date news as it breaks and is the longest running show on the channel, airing twice a day Monday to Friday and throughout the day over the weekends. CNN has developed a lot since its founding in 1980 by American media proprietor Ted Turner as a 24 hour cable news channel. As an organisation, CNN have won multiple awards, including a network-record six news and documentary Emmy Awards in 2018.

programme.title: Showtime
programme.desc: Jennifer Lopez performed at Abu Dhabis Etihad Arena in July, one of dozens of events that take place here every year. Stars like her regularly steal the show. But we are shifting the spotlight to the men and women that bring these performances to life. We go behind the scenes at both the JLo concert and the Arenacross World Championship, seeing firsthand how these shows make it on stage.

programme.title: CNN Newsroom

programme.title: Connecting Africa
programme.desc: The African continent is going through a big transformation and this CNN magazine presents the entrepreneurs, companies and projects that are working hard to modernise it and make its economic integration possible. Hosted by Eleni Giokos, the episodes bring stories about the fast growing industry, network communication, cross-border trade and increasing trading routes, air connectivity, logistics infrastructure, small businesses and more.

programme.title: Inside Africa
programme.desc: Rising dramatically from the plains of southern Malawi, Mount Mulanje is a soaring granite massif known as the "Island in the Sky." It is home to a fragile and unique ecosystem and at its heart stands the Mulanje cedar (Widdringtonia whytei), a tree so rare its found nowhere else on Earth. Once covering vast slopes of the mountain, the cedar is now critically endangered. Illegal logging, wildfires, and climate change have brought it to the brink, with only a handful of mature, seed-producing trees ever documented in recent years. Declared Malawis national tree, the cedar has become a symbol of both loss and resilience. We explore the bold and deeply collaborative effort to bring this species back from the edge. At the core of this movement are local Malawians, young men and women who grow thousands of cedar seedlings in grassroots nurseries, carry them in woven baskets to high- altitude planting sites, and spend days traversing rugged trails to restore whats been lost. Their work is physically demanding and often overlooked, but essential to the projects success.

programme.title: Marketplace Asia
programme.desc: Marketplace Asia on CNN offers unique access to the latest Asian market information, with a look at latest events and developments that impact its business world. Follow the top business stories that influence and shape the Asian continent. Have a look at the interviews with outstanding figures of business and industry and reveal the economic trends in various regions of Asia to get to know the continents key sectors and corporations.

programme.title: Marketplace Middle East
programme.desc: The Middle East is undergoing a healthcare revolution, with cutting-edge medical technology, increased investment, and world-class facilities transforming the sector. At the forefront of this change is Sir Magdi Yacoub, the renowned British-Egyptian heart surgeon whose groundbreaking work has saved countless lives. Now, hes bringing his expertise home with the launch of a state-of-the-art hospital in Cairo, set to become a regional center of excellence in cardiac care and research. We explore Yacoubs legacy his vision for the future of healthcare in the region. Also: in this Abu Dhabi operation theatre room, the lead surgeon, Dr. Usman Ahmad, has multiple robot arms as he conducts surgery. As the first hospital in the Gulf to successfully perform robotic lung transplants, Cleveland Clinic Abu Dhabi is at the forefront of the region, presenting a strong case for utilizing robotics in the treatment of complex thoracic conditions. We explore the importance of robotic-assisted surgery for high-risk patients and how this will transform transplant care in the wider region.

programme.title: Inside Politics
programme.desc: Inside Politics is a political talk show, broadcast on CNN and anchored by CNN Chief National Correspondent John King. programme.title: U.S. State of the Union Address
programme.desc: The Speech is addressed to the Congress and the American people. It aims to highlight administration work and its victories, target political enemies and demonstrate the Presidents vision for the whole country.

programme.title: Fareed Zakaria GPS
programme.desc: Weekly public affairs show hosted by an American journalist, political scientist, and author Fareed Zakaria. The show is broadcasted on CNN every Sunday in many countries of the world. The "GPS" in the shows title stands for "Global Public Square," a reference to the shows focus on international issues and foreign affairs. The guests of the shows one-on-one interviews and roundtable discussions are most prominent figures in the world of global politics, economy and global decision-makers and influencers.

programme.desc: One of the CNNs longest running programmes that allows viewers to find out all the global sports news, see all the important events and most interesting parts, and enjoy the interviews with sports pundits and various sports stars.

programme.title: Showtime
programme.desc: Jennifer Lopez performed at Abu Dhabis Etihad Arena in July, one of dozens of events that take place here every year. Stars like her regularly steal the show. But we are shifting the spotlight to the men and women that bring these performances to life. We go behind the scenes at both the JLo concert and the Arenacross World Championship, seeing firsthand how these shows make it on stage.

programme.title: CNN Newsroom Sunday
programme.desc: Updates of the latest news from around the world.

programme.title: CNN Newsroom Sunday
programme.desc: Updates of the latest news from around the world.

programme.title: Fareed Zakaria GPS
programme.desc: Weekly public affairs show hosted by an American journalist, political scientist, and author Fareed Zakaria. The show is broadcasted on CNN every Sunday in many countries of the world. The "GPS" in the shows title stands for "Global Public Square," a reference to the shows focus on international issues and foreign affairs. The guests of the shows one-on-one interviews and roundtable discussions are most prominent figures in the world of global politics, economy and global decision-makers and influencers.

programme.title: African Voices Changemakers
programme.desc: African Voices: Change makers is a CNN programme that focuses on some of Africas brightest and most brilliant change makers as they engineer innovative solutions or beneficial changes that will positively impact their communities. CNN is a constantly evolving and diversifying channel and African Voices is evidence of this new approach to news, utilising sources from across the globe. As an organisation, CNN have won multiple awards, including a network-record six news and documentary Emmy Awards in 2018.

programme.title: Marketplace Asia
programme.desc: Marketplace Asia on CNN offers unique access to the latest Asian market information, with a look at latest events and developments that impact its business world. Follow the top business stories that influence and shape the Asian continent. Have a look at the interviews with outstanding figures of business and industry and reveal the economic trends in various regions of Asia to get to know the continents key sectors and corporations.

programme.title: Body Cam
programme.desc: Documentary series following police officers across the USA as they put their lives on the line to enforce the law. Using real footage from the officers body cameras, we show just how deadly routine checks can be, with law enforcement officials having to think on their feet and make split-second decisions to potentially save their, or someone elses, life. From knife-wielding maniacs to brutal shootouts, the series highlights the importance of our police departments. With interviews from the officers involved adding context to the footage, Body Cam Cops gives viewers unprecedented, exclusive access to what life is truly like in the line of duty.

programme.title: Moonshiners: Whiskey Business
programme.desc: Whiskey production is no easy feat, as many aspiring distillers find out the hard way. Luckily for the struggling Missouri Ridge Distillery, "Moonshiners" star and experienced distiller, Tim Smith, is here to help them turn a corner and start making a profit. The business has masses of expensive equipment, forking out millions to create a distillery many moonshiners would kill for. But with pockets deeper than their knowledge of whiskey, the Missouri outfit has all the gear, but no idea. Along with fellow experts Tim Jones and Devin Mills, Tim gives the business the help it needs, sharing the knowledge and wisdom that saw him turn his illicit back-country brewing setup into a bestselling American whiskey.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: The Restorers
programme.desc: Expert craftsmen are bringing Drew Pritchards finds back to life and restore them to their former glory. Drew hunts for treasures such as derelict gems and forgotten remnants across the country. And then he and his team do the restoration turning trash to gold, so that worn objects become shining gems for which Drews customers want to pay a lot of money. All kinds of items can and will be restored, starting from a century-old suitcase to an ancient coffee machine, from a ravaged carousel horse to a large railway clock.

programme.title: Brake Room
programme.desc: Record breaking racer and off-road champion Jessi Combs faces off against celebrity bike customiser Jesse James in a battle of motor wits. [9-AT]

programme.title: Brake Room
programme.desc: Celebrity bike customiser Jesse James and metal fabricator James Pumphrey compete in the ultimate battle of the motor-heads. [9-AT]

programme.title: Road Rage
programme.desc: A woman bites another driver. A young woman takes evasive manoeuvres to survive a road-raging driver. Motorists fight in a drive-thru.

programme.title: Road Rage
programme.desc: Good Samaritans rescue road rage victims. Californians negotiate dangerous roadways. A man defends his child from a gun-toting menace.

programme.title: Border Control Italia
programme.desc: Follows the officers of the Security and Customs Services at the borders of Italy, which are under the constant threat from drugs, weapons, and suspected terrorists.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Buy, repair and restore and then resell a classic car in order to make profit- this is what Wheeler Dealers is about. The budget is limited, though you can see some exclusive and rare cars. Mike Brewer, a British dealer chooses the car carefully and hands it over to the mechanic, first Edd China, later Ant Anstead to be fixed and upgraded. The hosts are real masters of their trade, it seems they can bring life even to a piece of metal. It does not matter if you are a life-long car enthusiast or do not even have a driving license you will admire the results of hard work from the beginning to the end of the long uneasy restoring process.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: Classic Cars
programme.desc: Drew Pritchard and Paul Cowland travel across the United Kingdom to uncover classic cars to buy, restore and sell on for a profit. The pair scour garages, barns and facilities to discover collectible cars which include the likes of the Morris Minor Traveller, Jaguar XJS, Rover P6 and a BMW 635 CSI among many others. The combination of Drews expertise of negotiation and deal-making and Pauls extensive mechanical knowledge makes them a formidable team ready to tackle anything challenging that comes their way.

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: Have you ever wondered how things that surround us every day are produced? Find out about the whole process from the beginning to the end in a documentary television series How Its Made. The series demonstrates how various items like clothing and accessories, food, industrial products, cars, musical instruments and many more are manufactured. Who would have thought how exciting it would be to watch a cupcake, formula 1 race car or gummy vitamins being made?

programme.title: American Chopper
programme.desc: American Chopper is an American reality television series that revolves around the Teutuls- Paul Senior, his sons Paul Junior and Michael who work together at Orange County Choppers, a custom motorcycle fabrication company located in Montgomery, New York. The series is a mix of competition and drama, famous for real fighting, cursing, crying, welding, and painting. Its indisputable that each Teutul is a gifted mechanic, engineer and designer, they put together a motorbike in front of the viewers and make every customers wish come true.

programme.title: The Autobahn A2
programme.desc: One of Europes busiest, most dangerous and most important highways. For many people its their place of work, and many more use it to travel across Europe.

programme.title: The Autobahn A2
programme.desc: One of Europes busiest, most dangerous and most important highways. For many people its their place of work, and many more use it to travel across Europe.

programme.title: Roadworthy Rescues
programme.desc: Steve Dulcich returns along with the Vanishing Paint Challenger. Derek and Steve switch out the gearbox and go to a local road course.

programme.title: Roadworthy Rescues
programme.desc: Derek goes off the deep end with an 80s icon, the DeLorean. Its been wrecked and doesnt run, but Derek and his friends change all that with a good old junkyard LS.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: The Restorers
programme.desc: Expert craftsmen are bringing Drew Pritchards finds back to life and restore them to their former glory. programme.title: Alaskan Bush People
programme.desc: Alaskan Bush People is an American docudrama-style reality TV series revolving around the Brown family, members of which are trying to survive in the wilderness, far away from the society. Take a journey deep into Alaskas bush, where naturalist and adventurer Billy Brown, along with his wife, Ami, and their seven children, choose to live life on their own terms, connected to wild nature and bonded to each other.

programme.title: 100 Days Wild
programme.desc: The brute harshness of Alaskas wilderness is no joke, with hostile weather and dangerous animals constantly lurking on the horizon. In this documentary series, a group of seven strangers give up their creature comforts to build a self-sustaining community along the Tanana River, and they have 100 days before the biting chill of winter arrives. They must quickly learn to work as a team if their makeshift community is going to work, learning to hunt, gather and implement basic structures that will keep them dry and warm. Will they be able to handle the wilderness?

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: Gold Rush is a reality television series that follows the placer gold mining efforts of various family-run mining companies in boundless north of America. The series focuses on the work process in the conditions of permafrost and working relations between the participants. The show has 10 seasons altogether. In some episodes participants start the adventure and travel to Alaska to search for gold because of financial issues. They do not have any previous experience and have to learn on the job. Then there appears several gold mining teams that compete with each other. In some episodes the teams move to South America. Admire the courage and determination of the team members in their unstoppable desire to become rich.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: Gold Rush is a reality television series that follows the placer gold mining efforts of various family-run mining companies in boundless north of America. The series focuses on the work process in the conditions of permafrost and working relations between the participants. The show has 10 seasons altogether. Admire the courage and determination of the team members in their unstoppable desire to become rich.

programme.title: Abalone Wars
programme.desc: In Port Lincoln the abalone crews take advantage of a break in the weather to seize their share of this $35bn trade. But will the tight time line force them to take stupid risks?

programme.title: Expedition Unknown
programme.desc: American archaeologist, author and explorer Josh Gates explores the world to solve longstanding mysteries and legends that are yet to be solved. With no story too big, Josh travels across the globe to identify clues and secrets that could help him find the truth. First he must gather as much information about the case, before jetting off to pursue his leads. Whether its uncovering long lost Nazi treasures, unearthing the birth place of Jesus, deciphering the origin of Stonehenge or investigating the Vikings rise to power, Josh leaves no stone unturned in his quest for answers.

programme.title: Expedition X
programme.desc: Join our hosts, adventurer Josh Gates, scientist Phil Torres and paranormal researcher Jessica Chobot, as they travel around the planet uncovering the secrets behind supernatural phenomena, mythical beasts and alien activity. Each trip leads the team on a quest to reveal the bizarre truth of these fascinating stories. Epsiodes include a journey deep into the Cambodian jungle to search for a monster from a lost city; a spelunking expedition sees the team investigating the largest cave system in the world; an active volcano in Washington state might hold the clue to some extraterrestrial mysteries; and an exploration of a haunted dwelling in the Amazon causes panic in the middle of the night.

programme.title: NASAs Unexplained Files
programme.desc: What do we really know about life beyond the realm of our planet? Disturbing discoveries about the rest of our universe have perplexed scientists, and the rest of the world, for as long as we can remember. Now, the files and discoveries of one of the worlds biggest independent agencies have been dug up, for thorough investigation. Each episode scrutinises questionable evidence, encounters and sightings, to shed some light on the unexplained files of NASA. Featuring testimonies of NASA insiders and scientists who have first hand experience of the enigmas, laying within our universe.

programme.title: Survival instinct
programme.desc: Each week, a new pair of total strangers are faced with the ultimate survival challenge: survive for 21 days together with no clothes or supplies in some of the most dangerous environments in the world. In addition to the landscape itself working against the duo, the local wildlife stalk them as well. Of course, the biggest complication for any of the couples might end up being their own clashing egos. Will they make it out alive, or will they fall victim to the wilderness? They must fall back on their most primal instincts to ensure they dont become prey themselves.

programme.title: Survival instinct

programme.title: Salvage Dawgs
programme.desc: Mike Whiteside and Robert Kulp are the hosts of Salvage Dawgs show that is about saving beautiful old things from buildings planned to be torn down. They and their talented crew teach the viewers how to repurpose old stuff into something new and useful instead of throwing it away. So if you are remodeling your home think twice before you get rid of anything. Get creative, have some fun and learn tips and tricks to help you build your skills. Learn how to transform old chairs into a functional bench, how to repurpose an old paneled door into a shelf and enjoy fantastic vintage pieces from the past.

programme.title: Baggage Battles
programme.desc: Featuring professional buyers including antique dealers, a production designer and an eCommerce expert, these expert buyers travel around the world to lost baggage auctions, estate auctions and police auctions to find the hidden treasure and items left behind or siezed by customs in order to make the greatest profit. This American docu-reality series created by The Travel Channel in 2012. Finding contents in baggage such as a bronze sculpture, jewellery including 18 karat gold and a legendary belt, these professionals prove why they have a name for themselves in their industry, finding hidden gems in hidden places.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Meet modern-day treasure hunter Drew Pritchard. With demanding customers, high turnover, and one of the biggest decorative salvage yards in the UK, Drew is constantly on the road, crisscrossing the country in search of derelict gems and forgotten remnants. Drew loves the thrill of the hunt and while he gets his hands dirty in the countrys architectural backwaters, his team of restorers is back at the shop giving old and rare finds a new lease on life!

This American docu-reality series created by The Travel Channel in 2012. Finding contents in baggage such as a bronze sculpture, jewellery including 18 karat gold and a legendary belt, these professionals prove why they have a name for themselves in their industry, finding hidden gems in hidden places.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Treehouse Masters is an American reality television series hosted by Pete Nelson, a treehouse builder. Pete and his team design and build all types of treehouses for clients across the country. The clients and Petes team are the people who never stop dreaming. Youll be surprised to know how many people want to get away from the noisy comfortable cities and live in close communion with mother nature. So getting a treehouse is their chance to live a dream. Every episode will amaze you because of Petes talent and incredible imagination. He can build any type of a treehouse, starting from a small simple ones to most complex residences with all modern communication. Every wish of a customer will be heard and fulfilled.

programme.title: Farmhouse Fixer
programme.desc: Singer Jonathan Knight demonstrates his renovation know-how skills. He has renovated more than 200 houses, while preserving their original craftsmanship. He has been in this for more than 25 years, and thanks to his passion and talent he updates interiors while keeping the historical charm and chic.

programme.title: Flippin RVs
programme.desc: Our RV is a Palace. Justin and Anna renovate a huge Palace Royale to present at the annual Roslyn Vintage Trailer Rally in Washington. Also, a VIP client delivers a banged-up Airlight that requires special rivets to repair the skin.

programme.title: Tiny House Hunters
programme.desc: Reality series showing American house hunters who are considering joining the tiny-house revolution where people are choosing to live in smaller homes - often less than 55 square metres -and praising their benefits. In this property series realtors present three petite houses to prospective buyers. Some of the homes would be used as permanent residences whilst others could be a retreat to escape to. There are various reasons for the trend for tiny-living; some people are doing it for financial reasons, others are trying to live more ecologically and some yearn for a simpler lifestyle. When the potential tiny-homeowners are faced with the practical limitations of the properties on offer will they take the plunge and embrace the joys of tiny living? Or will they change their minds for more spacious accommodation?

programme.title: Renovation Impossible
programme.desc: Contractor Russell Holmes helps clients get their stalled renos back on track using ingenious compromises and dollar-stretching solutions.

programme.title: In The Eye Of The Storm
programme.desc: A rare winter tornado outbreak tears through towns across Tennessee as dozens of eyewitnesses capture the devastating power of nature in real time.

programme.title: Speed Cops
programme.desc: Road police on the hunt for posers and speeders all over Germany. The professionals know exactly whats impressive about cars - and whats illegal.

programme.title: The Autobahn A2
programme.desc: One of Europes busiest, most dangerous and most important highways. For many people its their place of work, and many more use it to travel across Europe.

programme.title: Road Rage
programme.desc: A mum defends her kid from a group of bikers. A deranged driver repeatedly rams another motorist. A driver defends himself from aggressive motorists.

programme.title: Road Rage
programme.desc: A group of women gets into a gigantic brawl in a Florida intersection. A motorcycle causes a massive accident. A man ploughs through a parade route.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: Gold Rush is a reality television series that follows the placer gold mining efforts of various family-run mining companies in boundless north of America. The series focuses on the work process in the conditions of permafrost and working relations between the participants. The show has 10 seasons altogether. In some episodes participants start the adventure and travel to Alaska to search for gold because of financial issues. They do not have any previous experience and have to learn on the job. Then there appears several gold mining teams that compete with each other. In some episodes the teams move to South America. Admire the courage and determination of the team members in their unstoppable desire to become rich.

programme.title: In The Eye Of The Storm
programme.desc: A rare winter tornado outbreak tears through towns across Tennessee as dozens of eyewitnesses capture the devastating power of nature in real time.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Meet modern-day treasure hunter Drew Pritchard. With demanding customers, high turnover, and one of the biggest decorative salvage yards in the UK, Drew is constantly on the road, crisscrossing the country in search of derelict gems and forgotten remnants. Drew loves the thrill of the hunt and while he gets his hands dirty in the countrys architectural backwaters, his team of restorers is back at the shop giving old and rare finds a new lease on life!

programme.title: Race of Life
programme.desc: Males and females of most species will fight viciously in self-defense. And females, can be even more aggressive than males when defending their young. In this episode well explore the Race of Life from the point of view of food, territory, social status, and mates. Though some fights occur between two different species, most battles are fought between members of the same species. Though the wildlife warriors in these battles usually are not trying to kill each other, the fighting can result in death. Why would members of the same species fight with such ferocity? Food is one reason. Animals that store and horde food for survival will aggressively protect their pantries. Animals are also willing to fight to protect their food indirectly. For example, predators will defend a territory that provides them with enough prey, or food, to survive. This territorial aggression serves to space out members of a species across their range in a way that maintains sufficient food within each territory. But it also may limit population size. For example, if a pack of wolves cannot find, defend, or take over a suitable territory, the members may starve to death. Though food, territory, social status, and mates may be won and kept by fighting, aggression takes its toll. Animal combatants face exhaustion, injuries, time away from resting and eating, and the ultimate cost of battle: death. Thus, just like human beings, its often in an animals interest to win a war before it ever begins - or to avoid confrontation altogether.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Chasing Tales
programme.desc: The Pungwe pack are in striking distance, will they succeed? The surrounding community gets involved in conservation. Jess is in the right place at the right time to witness something astonishing. Rosemary gets hands on with Africas largest predator as she needs to remove a research collar. The camera crew gets stuck into a muddy zebra rescue. The Pungwe pack execute yet another successful take down.

programme.title: The Polar School of Nomad Children
programme.desc: 360° GEO- Report visits the Nenets, the last true nomads on earth, on their remote Russian peninsula. Every August, on the Russian polar peninsula of Yamal, children of reindeer shepherds await a helicopter that will bring them back to school after the summer holidays. For the main part of the year, 600 nomad children from the indigenous people of the Nenet live and learn separated from their parents. Up until now, their home Yamal was an of Russia that was far from any semblance of civilization- until an enormous gas pool was discovered beneath the tundra. Now, destroyed nature and gigantic industrial plants are a common sight along the nomads track - but this industrial development is also offering new opportunities to their children.

programme.title: A Dogs Life
programme.desc: A Dogs Life explores the widely assumed facts that may actually be based on faulty and out-dated research. Ingenious experiments and meticulous observation reveal that the problems dogs solve best are those that involve interacting with humans. A fascinating and fun documentary that gives us a dogs eye view on the world.

programme.title: Animal Doctors
programme.desc: Explore how animals developed over time and generations their own medicine and health care strategies. How have these been passed onto early humans ? Questioning traditional boundaries between human and animal, we will travel from Central African Republic, to Tanzania, from the US to France with the leading experts in animal behaviour. Todays science revisits the birth of animal intelligence and culture.

programme.title: Mongolia, Steppes Emirate
programme.desc: Battered by strong winds, and seen as a grazing land, Mongolia is the kingdom of steppes. With important mineral resources such as copper or uranium, coal and rare soil, Mongolia future is secure: the economy shows a significant growth rate and it is a business paradise for some expatriates. But for most of the population, needs remain unfulfilled.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. As an ethnomusicologist and world music record producer, Edgar travels the globe hunting for the best songs the world has to offer, and he suffers through some of the worst…so you dont have to. Along the way, hes rewarded with a backstage pass to concert halls, street festivals, recording studios and rehearsal rooms. With local musicians as his guide, Edgar tastes exotic and occasionally ghastly food, visits off-the-beaten path attractions and parties the night away to amazing concerts at hidden venues that only the locals know. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: The Bosnian War was an extraordinarily complex event, with many layers of military involvement including NATO forces, national militaries, irregular paramilitary forces, mujahedeen revolutionaries, private security companies, and international intelligence personnel. One tactic in particular struck fear into the hearts of the military and civilians alike: the use of snipers positioned in high buildings. This edition of CQB investigates this speciﬁ c combat technique and how it was countered by opposing forces. Taking viewers inside a "snipers den," the program explains how this tactic was so successfully used by rebel forces-and how traditional military techniques evolved to combat it.

programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: Built in the early 1800s, Whitby Hall used to be an administrative center and now stands as a public park and arts center. It has never before been investigated, but staff have reported many noises and presences among them.

programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: The county of Flintshire in Wales is said to be a land filled with ghosts and haunts. Plas Teg is said to be one of the "most haunted" houses in the area. With over 400 years of history, this place is sure to be the home of many an entity.

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: This show features some segments that didnt fit in their respective episodes. We play around at the Pinball Museum in Las Vegas. Then, we salute the Commander in Chief at the Presidential Hall of Fame in Clermont, FL. Also, well swim with real mermaids at Weeki Wachee Springs in Central Florida, and cheer on Teddy Ballgame at the Ted Williams Hitters Hall of Fame.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: To this day sisal, a rope making fiber plant, is a mainstay of the economy. Journeys tours the capital city of Tanzania and its diverse religious institutions before heading into sisal country. Well learn about the German influences and the seldom heard story of Livingstones final trip across Africa.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: This is one of the few national parks in Africa where the bush meets the ocean. The big game of Africa face off with the creatures of the deep. Our host goes a little rogue for supper and tries his hand at surf netting prawns after spending a day looking for the elusive elephants of Saadani.

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Islands
programme.desc: A trip to Sardinia, along the western coast, to the Sinis protected marine area and the Island of Mal di Ventre. Together with Angelo, a local diving instructor, we dive around the Catalano rocks where we swim between the basaltic columns, arches and huge eroded volcanic rocks. Back on land we visit the strange architecture of San Giovanni del Sinis and the famous historic archeological site of Tharros, one of the largest ancient cities in the Mediterranean, founded by Phoenicians and inhabited for 1900 years. We then visit the Mistras lagoon where we see thousands of Flamingos and Cormorants, and it is here that we find Giuseppes riding stables, where he has a center for traditional horse training which is the art of "Monta da Lavoro". And talking of tradition, we end our Sardinian journey with a close-up on Sardinian traditions, local arts and crafts, food and folklore.

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Islands
programme.desc: In the middle of the Indian Ocean, 2000 kilometres from the east coast of Africa, 800 east of Madagascar, and 220 north-east of Reunion, is the island of Mauritius, a volcanic island where different races, cultures, religions, colours and spices all live together in harmony. We visit the Ile Aix Aigrettes, a nature reserve that protects rare and interesting species such as the pink pigeon, giant tortoises, orchids and native lizards. This small island is the jewel in the crown of the Mauritius Wildlife Foundation that works for the protection of every animal and all of the vegetation in the territory. The entrance fee to the island contributes to financing the Foundations projects. Working our way south-west of the island we see the Tamarind Falls and the Le Morne Penisula, where people come from all over the world to kite surf.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Were shipping off to Belfast, Northern Ireland on todays episode. First, well gawk at the worlds biggest Titanic museum. Then, well learn about the provinces complicated history at the Ulster Museum. Finally, we get thrown in the slammer at the very creepy, Crumlin Road Jail.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Bonjour! Were headed to Quebec Province on todays show. First, we get blown away by the thunderous pipes at Montreals Notre Dame Basilica. After that, we go underneath the city at the Pointe a Calliere archaeology museum. Next, well learn about the native ecosystem at the gigantic, indoor, BioDome. Lastly, well learn about the 1967 Montreal Expo at the structures that are still visited today.

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures
programme.desc: Outta Town Adventures travels both near and far to discover the best advenures the destinations have to offer. Season 1 visits attractions from California to Rwanda, Switzerland, Iceland, Utah, Zambia, Mexico, The Grand Canyon, Georgia (the Eastern European one) Louisiana, Hawaii, Mauritius and Seychelles. This TV series is dedicated to presenting history, culture and geography in a fun and pisitive way. It encourages people to explore this beautiful world - something that starts with simply getting out of town!

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live
programme.desc: Show me where you live is a documentary series that aims to answer the following question: How can human beings claim ownership to a space so that they can live safely within it, function as a society, and above all be in harmony with the environment around them? As we discover cultures and emblematic populations, we follow Philippe Simay who is at the heart of Inhabiting the World and represents its identity and originality. Philippe takes us on an epic adventure around the Human Habitat and sets the tone for the journey. As a humanist and philosopher, Philippe is a tireless surveyor of the city, and an explorer of living spaces. Determined to travel around the world, Philippe unveils how the populations that he encounters claim the space they occupy, shapes it and adjust to it. In this series of 20 films, of 26 minutes each, the habitat will be a major showcase revealing our capacity to adapt ourselves at a time where we need to find solutions in order to address immense changes.
