programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: It has fired our imaginations for millennia, Mars, the God of War and the source of Mans science fictional demise. We know the dry barren planet was once flowing with vast reservoirs of water, the sky thick and filled with clouds and the tantalizing possibility of life. It is the only other place in our solar system than Man might one day call home.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: From the beginnings of our Solar System four and half billion years ago there remains tantalizing clues to its evolution; remnent debris: asteroids and comets. They vary in size from grains of dust to mountain sides, footballs to planetoids. They were the building blocks of the planets and perhaps carry the origins of life itself. Now within our grasp these rocks of ice and dust are ready to give up their secrets.

programme.title: On the Cities Rooftops
programme.desc: How is life on the citys roofs? This series scales new heights, exploring apartment buildings, towers and monuments to discover a world full of unsuspected treasures : our rooftops. By day and night, the population changes on these heights. There are people who work here, people who live here, and others who come here to relax. The worlds rooftops are a continual hive of activity…

programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: On a hot summers day, nothing cools you down like a frozen fruity POPSICLE! Youll learn how an 11-year old boy created this sweet icy treat! And, have you ever noticed those colored spinning poles outside the BARBERSHOP? Youll be in STITCHES when you learn how they got their start! Plus, find out how a melting chocolate bar gave way to the invention of the MICROWAVE!

programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: Its the city of love, Paris, France. The world over knows its most famous structure, the Eiffel Tower! But did you know PARISIANS originally wanted to tear it down! Well explain why and how it was saved! Then, youll visit Americas FIRST PIZZERIA! And how the gourmet ice cream HAAGEN DAZS got its exotic start in Bronx New York!

programme.title: Water: H2O Stories
programme.desc: Water: H2O Stories is a 3x52 series revisiting the story of water on planet Earth and its disrupted course over time which has led to the 21st century biggest challenge.

programme.title: Blue Realm
programme.desc: Filmed using crystal clear High Definition technology, The Blue Realm takes the viewer on a fascinating and breath-taking journey of discovery beneath the waves to examine the unique biology and extraordinary behaviour of undersea animals. Filmed by expert divers with a passion for marine life and environment, the compelling stories and captivating creatures come from many locations around the world including Papua New Guinea, Palau, South Africa, the Red Sea, the Great Barrier Reef, the Bahamas, Cocos Island, British Columbia, Texas, Indonesia, the Socorro Archipelago, California and Florida.

programme.title: Blue Realm

programme.title: Inside Outer Space
programme.desc: Come with us as we explore and unravel the mysteries of what lies beyond our planet Earth. This is a series packed with space stories and information about our universe covering what we can see, how we can live in space and what science tells us about the past and the future as we journey inside out of space.

programme.title: Inside Outer Space
programme.desc: Come with us as we explore and unravel the mysteries of what lies beyond our planet Earth. This is a series packed with space stories and information about our universe covering what we can see, how we can live in space and what science tells us about the past and the future as we journey inside out of space.

programme.title: A Year in the Wild
programme.desc: As a new year starts in the heart of Africa, the rainy season has come to the Okavango Delta in Botswana, and with it begins a season of plenty and the luxury of permanent and abundant water sources. In South Africas Hluhluwe-Imfolozi Game Reserve, a group of rare samango monkeys take advantage of the abundant fruit born by a large Natal fig tree. In Thailand, a group of rhesus macaques have discovered a mango tree, and are busy feeding and stuffing their throat pouches with the fruit. Back in the Okavango Delta, the rains have also brought large buffalo herds back to the Xakanaxa area, the territory of a powerful pride of lions. Life and death are also a close-run thing for young gannet fledglings on their massive breeding colony of 50.000 birds on Malgas Island off the South African coast. As the young birds attempt to spread their wings and take to the air, some end up in the water. Many young animals have to run a gauntlet early on in life, and as a young loggerhead turtle hatches out of its egg and emerges from the sand on a beach in Mozambique, it faces a gruelling journey from its nest on the beach down to the sea. African penguins, too, are adapted to life at sea, but rest, breed and mate on land. Penguins elsewhere in the world face an almost unbelievable challenge to breed and rear their young. When it comes to raising animals, the African plains are no more forgiving than the sub-Antarctic. At this time of year, the Serengeti plains in Tanzania are teeming with herds of wildebeest and zebra with their young. Predators are never far away. In a Thai forest, stingless bees are busy building a cone-shaped nest in a tree, combining forces for the greater good of the colony. Kamfers Dam in South Africa is one of only four breeding colonies of Lesser Flamingos, at times reaching up to 50.000 birds. The sun sets over the spectacular sight of thousands of flamingos, straining the water for food and taking to the air.

programme.title: Sarah Shark
programme.desc: Sarah travels to one of the top 10 dive destinations in Australia (Julian Rocks, Byron Bay, NSW) to dive with three species of Wobbegong Sharks within the Cape Byron Marine Park. She also conducts a street poll with members of the public to find out what they think about sharks.

programme.title: Sarah Shark
programme.desc: Sarah travels to one of the top 10 dive destinations in Australia (Julian Rocks, Byron Bay, NSW) to dive with three species of Wobbegong Sharks within the Cape Byron Marine Park. She also conducts a street poll with members of the public to find out what they think about sharks.

programme.title: Wild Australia with Ray Mears
programme.desc: Ray starts by hitching a lift on a research crane to get a birds eye view over the Rainforest; from there, he can see the geographical position responsible for this lush vegetation: mountain range in the west and the sea in the east. He then goes down to the ground, delving into the heart of the jungle, he comes across millennial trees, camouflage spiders and a miniature dinosaur, the Boyds Forest Dragon. He pursues his journey by travelling on a zipwire with wildlife expert, Justin McMahon. Together they observe life in the canopy. Meanwhile, Rays cameraman Martin Hayward Smith has been filming an animal that can only be found in this part of the world: the Bennetts tree kangaroo, a cute marsupial that lives like a monkey.

programme.title: Wild Australia with Ray Mears
programme.desc: Ray takes the Great Ocean Road along the Antarctic facing coast of Australia - the longest South facing coastline in the world. He starts in Port Philp Bay the entrance to Melbourne Harbour where for the first time he sees a strange marine creature - the weedy sea dragon - a relative of the sea horse. He also swims with a unique species of dolphin - the Burrunan Dolphins.Crossing the Bay he heads off down the longest War Memorial in the world - the Great Ocean Road and meets 93 year old Doug Stirling who remembers the world war 1 veterans building the road.Ray visits the Penguin Colony on Middle Island where guard dogs protect the penguins from foxes and he watches the night time return of the penguins after a day spent at sea fishing.He takes to the seas and discovers the creatures of the deep waters - albatross, balls of krill and a pod of fast moving common dolphins.

programme.title: Wild Australia with Ray Mears
programme.desc: In this episode, Ray explores the Red Centre of the country and shows that the Australian desert is filled with life for those who know where to find water.He arrives in the Red Centre by chopper as he flies over the Uluru monolith or Ayres Rock. For his first stop, he goes to a red kangaroo sanctuary where he cuddles a joey, meets their carer Brolga and gets close to the usually wary adult red kangaroos. He pursues his journey deeper in the desert to meet a local aboriginal Sammy Wilson. They go to a traditional waterhole and chat over a camp fire about Sammys ancestral knowledge of the land. Ray spends the night out under the stars before driving more inland to rocky areas where water collects. There Ray comes face to face with a wild kangaroo and rock wallabies. He then follows tracks along a dry river bed that lead him to Australias wild dog: a dingo.

programme.title: Animal Embassy
programme.desc: The dilemma faced by every 21st Century wildlife park is how to attract and educate the public, while maintaining first class conditions for its inhabitants and leading the way in scientific research and environmental protection. Tucked away in the Canary Islands, one zoo is providing a masterclass in the art. For the past 2 years running, Loro Parque has been voted "The Worlds Best Zoo" by subscribers of Trip Advisor, echoing the highest possible accreditations of animal welfare, conservation and environmental bodies across the globe. It is now considered more popular than the prestigious San Diego, Singapore, ZooParc de Beauval, Prague, Chester and St.Louis Zoos. So how has a privately-owned zoo in a Spanish colony off the West coast of Africa earned such recognition? How does it balance the meticulous care and presentation of thousands of species, with the multi-million-dollar research and conservation programs dedicated to saving many of them from extinction? Whats the strategy behind its educational commitment to turning every pleasure-seeking tourist into a die-hard environmentalist? And who manages the harvest of tonnes of organic fruit needed to feed the animals daily? What began 45 years ago with one mans passion for animals and an obsession with excellence has become a monument to best practice ideals. Boasting leading experts in all branches of zoology, animal handling, nutrition and veterinary science, as well as state of the art facilities and cutting-edge technology, Loro Parque talks the talk and walks the walk. Animal Embassy peels back the layers of Loro Parque to expose its pumping heart: the intimate connections, the scale of operations, the dramas, the discoveries, the camaraderie, the hilarity, the uncompromising attention to detail and the unshakable devotion to animal welfare. Entertaining, inspiring and informative, this series is packed with engaging, returnable characters - both animal and human. The dilemma faced by every 21st Century wildlife park is how to attract and educate the public, while maintaining first class conditions for its inhabitants and leading the way in scientific research and environmental protection. Tucked away in the Canary Islands, one zoo is providing a masterclass in the art. For the past 2 years running, Loro Parque has been voted "The Worlds Best Zoo" by subscribers of Trip Advisor, echoing the highest possible accreditations of animal welfare, conservation and environmental bodies across the globe. It is now considered more popular than the prestigious San Diego, Singapore, ZooParc de Beauval, Prague, Chester and St.Louis Zoos. So how has a privately-owned zoo in a Spanish colony off the West coast of Africa earned such recognition? How does it balance the meticulous care and presentation of thousands of species, with the multi-million-dollar research and conservation programs dedicated to saving many of them from extinction? Whats the strategy behind its educational commitment to turning every pleasure-seeking tourist into a die-hard environmentalist? And who manages the harvest of tonnes of organic fruit needed to feed the animals daily? What began 45 years ago with one mans passion for animals and an obsession with excellence has become a monument to best practice ideals. Boasting leading experts in all branches of zoology, animal handling, nutrition and veterinary science, as well as state of the art facilities and cutting-edge technology, Loro Parque talks the talk and walks the walk. Animal Embassy peels back the layers of Loro Parque to expose its pumping heart: the intimate connections, the scale of operations, the dramas, the discoveries, the camaraderie, the hilarity, the uncompromising attention to detail and the unshakable devotion to animal welfare. Entertaining, inspiring and informative, this series is packed with engaging, returnable characters - both animal and human.

programme.title: Animal Embassy
programme.desc: Federica the turtle has arrived from Italy after a run in with a container ship. Loro Parques offered to be her forever home, but how will she go sharing her new digs with others? Youve heard of a fish out of water - try a turtle! Esmeralda the iguana has a lumpy belly and Jorge the vet is worried. Hes hoping its a bounty of eggs but knows he shouldnt count his iguanas before they hatch. Its fingers crossed for some scaly babies!

programme.title: Herding Sheep In Iceland
programme.desc: Starting at the beginning of September, the Northern Lights unveil their magical patterns on Icelands starry skies. At the same time, Icelanders celebrate the "Retir": sheep and horses are herded to the lowlands. 4,500 sheep and 800 horses spend 3 to 4 months in the untamed highlands. Now, they are rounded up. No single farmer can herd so many animals to the lowlands. The entire community helps.

programme.title: Deep Blue Dive
programme.desc: This film follows four Oxford University students as they embark on an epic, unsupported journey across the island of Svalbard, a deserted and barren icy wilderness in the north of Scandinavia. Their goal is to successfully retrace an expedition carried out nearly a century earlier. In 1923, four Oxford university predecessors had completed the arduous crossing. The team included the legendary Sandy Irvine, who famously partnered George Mallory a year later in a doomed attempt to become the first to climb Mount Everest. To this day, it remains a mystery whether they actually made it to the summit. Hundreds of hours of intense training and meticulous preparation are needed for such an expedition. They must learn how to deal with the dangers of polar bears and survive the freezing temperatures and the threat of prolonged storms. A key objective is to use a drone to document their arduous crossing of the ice and to carry out valuable scientific research into how global warming is affecting the glaciers of Svalbard, previously known as Spitsbergen (which means jagged mountains). Their expedition starts ominously as their boat journey to the first location at Duym Point faces heaving, mountainous seas which threaten the entire trip. Once ashore, each member has to pull 80 kilogramme sledges across the ice, carrying all of their supplies, climbing equipment, cameras, solar panels and tents. Spectacular drone footage reveals Svalbards dramatic icy landscape as never before. The drone is also used to map one of the larger glaciers to see exactly how much it has shrunk due to global warming. They are able to compare this glacier to a photograph taken on the 1923 expedition. The results are startling. Along the way, the team come across historical traces of the 1923 expedition, including wooden tent pegs and rusted tins which once contained Oxo stock cubes donated by a sponsor. At times, the Arctic weather proves their greatest enemy. For days on end, they endure violent winds of over 100 kilometres per hour which force the team to build a survival shelter in which they huddle together for warmth. In all, it takes 32 days of guts and determination to cross the archipelago, but the trip is a resounding success. One team member, Jamie Gardiner, tragically died the following year while on a climb in Norway. This film is dedicated to his memory.

programme.title: Life in the Blue
programme.desc: This films reveals the extraordinary variety of life found in the vast blue expanses of te open ocean. Here, all the action takes place in a 10 metre deep band of water, just under the surface. Many species use this section of water to migrate and hunt while others use ingenious ways to stay hidden where there appears to be no shelter. From the surface, the huge blue expanses of the open ocean appear to be devoid of all life. Popular belief is that most sea life congregates around mainline coasts, islands or rocky outcrops. But that perception is far from the truth. This 4K film,shot in the Atlantic, reveals the extraordinary diversity of species who call the open ocean their home and the tactics they use to survive in the watery wilderness. Most of the life here congregates in a nutrient-rich band of water, around 10 metres from the surface. But it is brutal life out in the open ocean. There is little shelter, big predators abound and food is hard to find. Only those who adapt to the conditions have a hope of surviving in the blue void. Barracuda are a common species in the open water and they travel in large spiraling groups close the surface as a defense mechanism against bigger predators. This space is also their own feeding ground and they can attack smaller fish en masse. And where there are barracuda, Blue sharks are never far away. These supreme open ocean predators are among the most graceful of sharks but when the need arises, they can transform instantly into ferocious and efficient killers. They regularly cross the Atlantic, coast to coast, in a journey of 4,000 kilometres. Other species profiled which also undertake huge journeys include turtles, pilot whales and whale sharks, and we reveal how the notorious Portuguese man o war provides shelter for small fish within its lethal tentacles. Other small fish of prey instinctively group together when they are threatened - as lone individuals they are far more likely to be eaten than large groups. But in dramatic close up action, a banquet is served as dolphins sprint in from the blue to harvest this massive source of protein. The film also reveals the amazing variety of life and colour found in shipwrecks. Like oases in the desert,these steel skeletons are colonized by soft and hard corals, attracting huge armies of small fish. They hide in the structures while larger fish and sharks roam the periphery.

programme.title: Mongolia, Steppes Emirate
programme.desc: Battered by strong winds, and seen as a grazing land, Mongolia is the kingdom of steppes. With important mineral resources such as copper or uranium, coal and rare soil, Mongolia future is secure: the economy shows a significant growth rate and it is a business paradise for some expatriates. But for most of the population, needs remain unfulfilled.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. As an ethnomusicologist and world music record producer, Edgar travels the globe hunting for the best songs the world has to offer, and he suffers through some of the worst…so you dont have to. Along the way, hes rewarded with a backstage pass to concert halls, street festivals, recording studios and rehearsal rooms. With local musicians as his guide, Edgar tastes exotic and occasionally ghastly food, visits off-the-beaten path attractions and parties the night away to amazing concerts at hidden venues that only the locals know. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Music Voyager

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: The practice of hiring private armies goes back to ancient times, and the mystique associated with the mercenary warrior has been the subject of many historical studies and ﬁ ctional characterizations. This episode of CQB takes a more contemporary look at a day in the life of a group of civilian contractors, and how their role has evolved on the modern battleﬁ eld. Using its "sub-second" analysis techniques and intimate ﬁrst-person footage, CQB reveals the backgrounds, training and equipment of todays "soldiers for hire" and how private armies are re-shaping the way conﬂ icts are conducted around the world.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: Carnfield Hall is a country house dating from the 15th and 16th Centuries. This private residence turn event hall is using its paranormal activity to draw in business. Are these spirits the old residents?

programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: The team investigate a disused factory in Burton-Upon-Trent. Reports of paranormal happenings are common and the team are ready for anything.

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: O Say can you see? Were in Baltimore, MD. Well learn about the Battle of Baltimore at Fort McHenry and the inspiration of the Star Spangled Banner. Then we dig deep into the history of Baltimores most famous resident, Edgar Allan Poe. Well sift through a huge collection of pop art and collectibles at the Geppi Museum, and learn about cracking codes at the National Cryptology museum.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: This is one of the few national parks in Africa where the bush meets the ocean. The big game of Africa face off with the creatures of the deep. Our host goes a little rogue for supper and tries his hand at surf netting prawns after spending a day looking for the elusive elephants of Saadani.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: If there ever was a lost wildlife gem, it would be Mikumi. Here many of the Big Twelve live their lives against the backdrop of one of the most scenic parks in Africa. Bill takes a break from the wildlife safari to investigate the huge salt works at the edge of the park and how it may impact future conservation.

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Islands
programme.desc: Our destination is the island of Rodrigues, in the Mascarene archipelago, a volcanic folly that is only 109 square kilometres surrounded by an uncontaminated coral reef. We visit the island and discover its beauty on land, underground and also underwater. In the Francois Leguat protected reserve we are privileged to see hundreds of Tortoises, a varying ages and sizes, as they mate undisturbed by our presence and our cameras. A local guide takes us to discover a system of caves that develops 18 metres below sea level. But it is the population of Rodriguez that surprises us the most: A people who have not adopted different ways or customs, but that live their lives proudly with the knowledge that they are fortunate to have been born in such an island paradise both on land and sea.

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Islands
programme.desc: An adventure in Croatia, to discover the Adriatic Sea but in apnoea. Together with Mike Maric, born in Rovigno dIstria and world record holder in apnoea, we explore the underwater sea beds, small very green islands and picturesque towns. But above all we visit the Brionian archipelago, and a National Park, of rare beauty, that in a very special way unites nature and different animal species and unexpected vegetables. Underwater, in apnoea, we swim over a field of Pinna nobilis or Noble Pen Shells, we enter underwater tunnels and caves with their magical light beams and finally we visit, at about 28 to 40 metres underwater the "Baron Gautch" a steam-boat that was shipwrecked in 1914, which is still quite well preserved.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: We travel to the end of the rainbow in Dublin, Ireland. Well gawk at the Book of Kells, a holy book displayed at Trinity College. We visited the hallowed halls of St. Patricks Cathedral, and touched famed Irishman, Daniel OConnells crypt at Glasnevin Cemetery. Finally, we learn the complicated history of Irish independence at Kilmainham jail.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: This episode we visit the bright lights of Vancouver, Canada. Well swing along the famous Capilano Suspension Bridge, get tranquil in Dr. Sun Yat Sens Chinese garden, learn about Captain Vancouver at the Vancouver Maritime Museum, dig up Cesna Em "The City Before the City" at the Museum of Vancouver, and dive into the citys seedy underbelly at the Police Museum.

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures
programme.desc: Outta Town Adventures travels both near and far to discover the best advenures the destinations have to offer. Season 1 visits attractions from California to Rwanda, Switzerland, Iceland, Utah, Zambia, Mexico, The Grand Canyon, Georgia (the Eastern European one) Louisiana, Hawaii, Mauritius and Seychelles. This TV series is dedicated to presenting history, culture and geography in a fun and pisitive way. It encourages people to explore this beautiful world - something that starts with simply getting out of town!

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures
programme.desc: Outta Town Adventures travels both near and far to discover the best advenures the destinations have to offer. programme.title: Show Me Where You Live
programme.desc: Show me where you live is a documentary series that aims to answer the following question: How can human beings claim ownership to a space so that they can live safely within it, function as a society, and above all be in harmony with the environment around them? As we discover cultures and emblematic populations, we follow Philippe Simay who is at the heart of Inhabiting the World and represents its identity and originality. Philippe takes us on an epic adventure around the Human Habitat and sets the tone for the journey. As a humanist and philosopher, Philippe is a tireless surveyor of the city, and an explorer of living spaces. Determined to travel around the world, Philippe unveils how the populations that he encounters claim the space they occupy, shapes it and adjust to it. In this series of 20 films, of 26 minutes each, the habitat will be a major showcase revealing our capacity to adapt ourselves at a time where we need to find solutions in order to address immense changes.

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live

programme.title: Travel Quest
programme.desc: Bill Ball breaks the rules and stereo types of travel shows as he ventures beyond the highlights. What do you do after youve lead groups to over 140 countries and all 7 continents? Welcome to Bills bucket list on steroids... Travel Quest. This new, fast-paced series chases Bill around the globe as he seeks out anything but the mundane and ordinary—coming face-to-face with the largest crocodiles in the world, snorkeling with thousands of jellyfish, walking on the rim of an exploding volcano, feeding a group of sharks without a cage, bicycling across the Serengeti... this is not your typical travel show!

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: One hundred kilometres above the Earths surface lies an invisible frontier: the edge of space. This is the Karman Line, the boundary between our planets atmosphere and what lies beyond. What does it take to cross that line?

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: Launching payloads into space is a very difficult task, historically rocket launches are the proverbial "swords into ploughshares" Missiles designed to carry atomic warheads now send satellites and probes into the solar system. Ironically its one of the few exploits Mankind undertakes that doesnt occur in nature.

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Islands
programme.desc: Our journey to Senegal takes us to discover a place that is rich in history, art and pure nature. Arriving in Dakar, our first stop is Goree Island, a small island that continues to keep the traces of Senegals colonial past: here, where we now find local artists colored shops, there was once the slave prisons. Slaves who waited to be transferred overseas and to European colonies. The present day Senegal, however, is made up of the salt harvest in the famous Pink Lake, agriculture in local villages and tourism in unique places, like the Sindia baobab forest and the Saloum river delta.

programme.title: Distant Shores
programme.desc: Series 9 of Distant Shores follows Paul and Sheryl Shard on a diverse voyage from England through the inland waterways of France to the Mediterranean Sea, an Atlantic crossing, and island-hopping in the Caribbean aboard their 49-foot sailboat, Distant Shores II. When they travel through France to arrive in the Med they sail to Gibraltar. From Gibraltar they enter the Atlantic Ocean stopping at the exotic port of Rabat on the west coast of Morocco, then head offshore to explore the Canary Islands before joining the Atlantic Rally for Cruisers (ARC) in Las Palmas for a 2,800 mile trans-atlantic passage to the Caribbean for Christmas celebrations.

programme.title: Distant Shores
programme.desc: Series 9 of Distant Shores follows Paul and Sheryl Shard on a diverse voyage from England through the inland waterways of France to the Mediterranean Sea, an Atlantic crossing, and island-hopping in the Caribbean aboard their 49-foot sailboat, Distant Shores II. programme.title: Of Boats And Men
programme.desc: Travelling by boat bears a priceless sense of Freedom and offers endless new vistas to all passengers. Across waterways around the world Boats are an essential tool of daily life whether they carry goods, serve as utilities or services in remote areas.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: The Moon, our closest celestial companion. Our indispensible dance partner through the cosmos. Lighting our night sky and gently tugging at our shores. Few have walked on her surface, though her allure remains strong, once again we are glancing her way with renewed interest and with a view to return very soon.

programme.title: Mongolia, Steppes Emirate
programme.desc: Battered by strong winds, and seen as a grazing land, Mongolia is the kingdom of steppes. With important mineral resources such as copper or uranium, coal and rare soil, Mongolia future is secure: the economy shows a significant growth rate and it is a business paradise for some expatriates. But for most of the population, needs remain unfulfilled.

programme.title: Nomads
programme.desc: Follow breathtaking travel adventures of some well known athletes of extreme sports. Have a look at some stunning locations in Alaska, Mexico, Argentina, Japan, Tahiti, Africa, Costa Rica, Norway, Hawaii and whitewater kayaking, extreme big mountain skiing, windsurfing, kiteboarding, extreme snowboarding and big wave surfing that push the limits of possibility. The focus is on compelling personalities and great storytelling.

programme.title: Nomads
programme.desc: Follow breathtaking travel adventures of some well known athletes of extreme sports. Have a look at some stunning locations in Alaska, Mexico, Argentina, Japan, Tahiti, Africa, Costa Rica, Norway, Hawaii and whitewater kayaking, extreme big mountain skiing, windsurfing, kiteboarding, extreme snowboarding and big wave surfing that push the limits of possibility. The focus is on compelling personalities and great storytelling.

programme.title: On the Cities Rooftops
programme.desc: How is life on the citys roofs? This series scales new heights, exploring apartment buildings, towers and monuments to discover a world full of unsuspected treasures : our rooftops. By day and night, the population changes on these heights. There are people who work here, people who live here, and others who come here to relax. The worlds rooftops are a continual hive of activity…

programme.title: China Uncovered
programme.desc: Famous Chinese Erhu player Zhao Lei is leaving his stamp on classical Chinese music by experimenting with musical fusion between the East and West. On a sharper note in downtown Shanghai, Yuyintang Livehouse opens its doors to contemporary music lovers. The spiritual home of cutting edge beats in Shanghai, Yuyintang has started the careers of Visual Kei band Lilith and progressive metal rockers Mathlotus, but the modern music scene is still reeling from the Rock n Roll ban of the Cultural Revolution. Join them as they strive to become the rock stars of tomorrow.

programme.title: Race of Life
programme.desc: These are Natures own Battletanks, and (with the exception of the Indian Elephant), all endemic to the African continent. The African Savannah is the stage for thousands of battles every day. How do elephants, these large, cumbersome creatures survive and even prosper on a diet that even the strictest vegetarian would pass on! Well for one thing, most other animals get out of their way. But lions and hyenas are not always so easily moved – they prey on young, sick and old elephants in particular. This seemingly gentle giant has been revealed to have a darker side in the last few years too. They may survive on just plant life, but that doesnt mean they dont like a fight – to the death. Elephants have been observed attacking and killing Rhinos in the last 20 years. Its a savage clash. Meanwhile, the Rhino, a tough looking customer if ever there was one, is an endangered species. When the great herds go on the search for food, predators go on the hunt for them. If ever there was an animal that seems destined to survive, its the Rhino, which has been around for over 6 million years. But it too has an enemy: mankind – the deadliest foe of all. Then theres the hippopotamus. An adult hippo is a huge, aggressive animal, and even the largest crocodiles tend to stay away from it. However, when baby hippos stray from their mothers, then crocodiles, lions and hyenas will have a go if they can get away without being attacked themselves by adults in the baby hippos herd. Thats why baby hippos must stay close to Mum

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: For over 24 years, East Timor (now known as Timor Leste) endured a crushing occupation inflicted on them by neighbouring Indonesia on the pretext of the fight against communism. The war was brought to a controversial conclusion in 1999. However, trauma from that period lives on as evidenced by the testimonies of Nelson Belo, Gregorio Saldanha and Pascal Oliveira, survivors of the infamous 1991 Santa Cruz Massacre. This film recalls the trauma of Timor Leste in this the tenth anniversary of its independence.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. programme.title: Desperate Hours
programme.desc: Disasters in the air and misfortunes at sea grab our attention because of the unusually large number of fatalities involved. But its not even necessary to leave dry land for a terrible disaster to happen. Rail journeys and even just getting in your car can be fraught with disaster. Thats the focus for this instalment of Desperate Hours – road and rail disasters. We will examine the causes of such accidents, be that the powers of nature or human folly. We are about to explore the worst of the worst destructive events from an ordinary day on Nigerian roads to a disastrous display of human error in Santiago de Compostella when the driver of a loaded passenger train went about 115 km/h over the established speed limit and drove his train straight into a wall. So buckle up; youre in for a bumpy ride…

programme.title: Desperate Hours
programme.desc: Life on planet Earth is a fragile enough proposition as it is. The Earth is an interconnected system, everything is dependent on everything else, and we as a species should learn how to avoid making things worse than they need to be. In this rather sobering instalment of Desperate Hours our special focus is on Environmental Disasters. We will explore what has actually been done to protect the environment in contrast to the long discussions on this topic. From polluting the planet in various ways to the effects of global warming we contemplate how our future might be affected. As custodians of the planet, are we not better to be safe, rather than sorry?

programme.title: Yemen, Chaos in Silence
programme.desc: After three years of war, Yemen is facing its worst humanitarian crisis since the end of World War II. Yemen, chaos in silence"" is an unprecedented journey that tells the story of a conflict that is unfolding virtually without outside witnesses. From Aden in the south to Sanaa in the north, via Taez, the front line, this film explores a devastated country, eroded by political and religious divisions and ravaged by cholera.

programme.title: Perception and Reality: The Magic of Science
programme.desc: Our film follows researchers who are bringing magicians tricks into the laboratory. With impossible magic, amazing facts, and opportunities for viewers to participate in the magic tricks, this extraordinary exploration peeks behind the curtain into a fascinating world where ancient magic meets modern science. Magician Julie Eng not only mystifies us with magic, she also takes us to Montreals McGill University to meet Jay Olson who is using card tricks to study consciousness. His research also includes an MRI machine that can apparently not only read minds, but also manipulate thoughts. In the US we meet with professor Anthony Barnhart. Hes a magician turned scientist who is using magic principles to investigate why we sometimes dont see whats right under our noses. We also meet Professor Amory Danek who is using the conjurors craft to study creativity and problem solving.Professor Ronald Rensink at the University of British Columbia discovered how small distractions can blind drivers to obvious dangers. These studies naturally led him to work with magicians to explore possible new experiments.In London England Gustav Kuhn conducts a study that tracks the eye movements of the magicians audience. We see tricks that fool us despite nothing actually happening, as well as demonstrations that reveal we can be blind even to our own choices. Colourful and compelling, our film takes a critical and engaging look at the fascinating facts revealed when you see the human mind through the eyes of a magician.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. As an ethnomusicologist and world music record producer, Edgar travels the globe hunting for the best songs the world has to offer, and he suffers through some of the worst…so you dont have to. Along the way, hes rewarded with a backstage pass to concert halls, street festivals, recording studios and rehearsal rooms. With local musicians as his guide, Edgar tastes exotic and occasionally ghastly food, visits off-the-beaten path attractions and parties the night away to amazing concerts at hidden venues that only the locals know. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: From the elite ex-special forces personnel in charge of guarding heads of state in conﬂ ict zones to the two-person teams that protect CEOs in dangerous regions, modern-day bodyguards must be well versed in close quarter battle techniques. An immense amount of planning and preparation is involved in each operation. From air travel, car convoys and helicopter shuttles to basic foot traﬃc, a close protection squad must be completely tuned to the Who, What, Where and When of any given situation. This episode of CQB focuses on the complex day-to-day and minute-to-minute operations of these elite teams and the highly developed techniques they employ.

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Komanda izskata bēdīgi slavenu lietu par ražīgiem zagļiem Edvardu Devlinu un Alfrēdu Bērnsu, kuriem tika piespriests nāvessods par Beatrises Rimmeres slepkavību 1951. gadā Mančestrā.

programme.title: Duo Mix
programme.desc: Nakts programma ar mūzikas video dažādām gaumēm. Dejojiet, dziediet līdzi vai izbaudiet, guļot zem segas.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Talsā nošauts vīrietis. Svešinieks ierauga iespēju, kas ir pārāk laba, lai to palaistu garām. Atlantā strīda saasināšanās beidzas ar viena vīrieša nāvi un otra nokļūšanu briesmās.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Narkotiku darījums autostāvvietā pārvēršas apšaudē, kurā iet bojā divi vīriešu no Atlantas. Nāvessoda izpilde pie moteļa Talsā pāraug dubultslepkavībā - slepkava pamana nozieguma aculiecinieku.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Detektīvs Džons Brauns sacenšas ar laiku - Talsā nošauta nevainīga vecmāmiņa. Vai pusaudži varētu būt viņas traģiskās nāves vaininieki?

programme.title: Slepkavība brīvdienās
programme.desc: Jauna vientuļā māte neierodas darbā Helovīna laikā. Viņas ģimenei un draugiem ir aizdomas par slepkavību.

programme.title: Slepkavība brīvdienās
programme.desc: Šajā sērijā kāds ietekmīgs pāris tiek atrasts nežēlīgi noslepkavots savās mājās Montgomerijā, Alabamā. Tas noticis Pateicības dienas vakarā, izmeklētājiem liekot aizsākt tūkstošiem jūdžu ilgas medības vairākos štatos.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Jaunas sievietes ķermenis tiek atrasts paslēpts niedrēs klusā parkā vairākus kvartālus no viņas mājām. Visu Kvīnsas apkaimi pārņem bailes. Pēc mēnešiem ilgas nemitīgas izmeklēšanas, pagātnes pavediens noved Ņujorkas policijas izmeklētājus pie negaidīta slepkavas.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Dažas dienas pirms Jaunās tūkstošgades ieslodzītais informators zvana policijai ar noslēpumainu informāciju par slepkavību. Tas liek desmitiem izmeklētāju doties uz Ņujorkas augstceltnēm, meklējot nozieguma vietu un līķi.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Divas jaunas sievietes ierodas Ņujorkā ar sapņiem par lielpilsētu. Nejauša tikšanās izraisa notikumu virkni, kas šos sapņus sagrauj uz visiem laikiem. Izmeklētājiem tikmēr jāapkopo virkne mulsinošu pavedienu, lai sauktu slepkavas pie atbildības.

programme.title: Bagātie un bezkaunīgie
programme.desc: Pēc viesuļvētras Katrīna postījumiem Ņūorleānas "Saints" uzvara Superbowl pacēla pilsētas noskaņojumu. Tomēr pēc spēles izcēlās skandāls par atlīdzībām, kas tika izmaksātas par pretinieku ievainošanu, radot jautājumus par notikušo.

programme.title: Bagātie un bezkaunīgie
programme.desc: Astoņdesmito gadu beigu boksa pasauli bija pārņēmusi alkatība un korupcija. Krāpnieks Riks Pārkers piespieda iesācēju Timu Andersonu uz cīņu pret NFL zvaigzni Marku Gastino. Andersona atteikšanās noveda pie traģiskām sekām.

programme.title: Kriminālistika: slepkavas noķeršana
programme.desc: Eksperti analizē smiltis, kas atrastas automašīnā pēc vīrieša pazušanas, un tas noved līdz līķim un sarežģītai slepkavības lietai.

programme.title: Kriminālistika: slepkavas noķeršana
programme.desc: Eksperti analizē saldētavā atrasto divu sieviešu līķus. Viņu priekšlaicīga nāve būtu saistīta ar kādu ļaunu plēsoņu.

programme.title: Kriminālistika: slepkavas noķeršana
programme.desc: Kad viņas māte paziņo par 13 gadīgo Lūsiju par pazušanu, policija un tiesu medicīnas izmeklētāji sāk rūpīgu patiesības meklēšanu.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: "Stocking Strangler" sērijveida slepkavas medības Kolumbusā beigu beigās noved pie Karltona Gerija aresta un notiesāšanas. Šaubas par viņa vainu rodas vairākus gadus vēlāk.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: No elitārās koledžas pilsētas pazūd divas sievietes. Sabiedrību pārņem panika -- ir atrasti viņu ķermeņi. Kādus ļaunus noslēpumus policija atklās, divām ģimenēm mudinot sabiedrību palīdzēt slepkavas meklēšanā un notiesāšanā?

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Atlantā, no 70 metru attāluma tiek sašauts jauns vīrietis. Detektīvs Darins Smits uzzina par pieaugošo naidu, kas draud sadragāt visu apkārtni.

programme.title: Pirmās 48 stundas
programme.desc: Kad 90 gadus vecs kara varonis tiek sašauts mugurā, izmeklētāji atklāj, ka viņa bijušais kaimiņš varētu būt atbildīgs par notikušo. Jauna vīrieša nākotne tiek spēji pārtraukta - viņa plāns ātri nopelnīt naudu noiet greizi.

programme.title: Slepkavība brīvdienās
programme.desc: Agrā Ziemassvētku vakara stundā tirdzniecības centra autostāvvietā tiek atrasts nošauts vīrietis un sieviete. Izmeklētāji uzskata, ka šo nežēlīgo slepkavību varētu būt izraisījis mīlas trīsstūris.

programme.title: Slepkavība brīvdienās
programme.desc: Jauna sieviete pazūd pēc 4. jūlija pludmales ballītes. Izmeklētājiem ir tikai dažas norādes, ko darīt tālāk. Lietas pavērsiens atklāj, ka viņa varētu būt jaunākais upuris plēsoņam, kas terorizē šo apkārtni.

programme.title: Slepkavība brīvdienās
programme.desc: Pamesta automašīna, kas piepildīta ar asinīm, ved izmeklētājus pazudušās sievietes un viņas pusaugu meitas pēdās, kas nekad neieradās uz ģimenes ballīti 4. jūlijā. Viņu mirstīgās atliekas tiek atrastas dīķī, un mazpilsētā katrs tiek turēts aizdomās.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Rodžers Brūks - populārs administrators vienā no vecākajiem Ņujorkas restorāniem - atrasts nogalināts savā dzīvoklī pilsētas slavenajā "Restorānu alejā". Izmeklētāji atklāj upura slēpto dzīvi un stindzinošo iespēju sagaidīt jaunus upurus.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Pazūd jauna baņķiere, un policija apkopo pēdejos mirkļus, kad viņa redzēta. Izmeklēšana noved viņus pie profesionāļa, kurš nav tāds, kā viņš sevi parāda.

programme.title: Bagātie un bezkaunīgie
programme.desc: Kubas beisbola zvaigznes Jasiela Puiga bīstamā emigrēšana, lai īstenotu savu sapni par MBL - izvairoties no kontrabandistiem, karteļiem, ķīlnieku situācijām un satriecošām nodevībām, beigu beigās kļūstot par "Dodgers" sensāciju.

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Advokāti Saša Vass un Džeremijs Deins atskatās uz 30. gadu slepkavības lietas izmeklēšanu un atklāj, ka sašķeltā ģimene beidzot ir atkalapvienojusies.

programme.title: Slepkavība, noslēpumi un mana ģimene
programme.desc: Komanda izskata bēdīgi slavenu lietu par ražīgiem zagļiem Edvardu Devlinu un Alfrēdu Bērnsu, kuriem tika piespriests nāvessods par Beatrises Rimmeres slepkavību 1951. gadā Mančestrā.

programme.title: Kriminālistika: slepkavas noķeršana
programme.desc: 12 gadus vecās Tijas Šārpas pazušanas gadījums Londonā noved līdz iespaidīgai meklēšanai, kuras laikā policija bija tuvu mājām.

programme.title: Kriminālistika: slepkavas noķeršana
programme.desc: Gadus pēc nozieguma uzziniet, kā kriminālistika palīdzēja atrisināt Bekijas Goddenas-Edvardas slepkavību, atrodot slepkavu, kurš diemžēl atkal bija noslepkavojis.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Detektīvi Ostinā atklāj skandalozu ļaunprātīgu izmantošanu dienas aprūpes centrā. Tas šausmina sabiedrību, savukārt sievietes visā valstī nāk klajā ar stāstiem par rituālu vardarbību. Vai ir iespējams, ka aiz tā visa slēpjas sātanistu tīkls?

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Teksasas kāds vīrs apgalvo, ka pastrādājis simtiem brutālu slepkavību. Lieta pēc lietas tiek izbeigta. Viņam piespriests nāvessods. Daži izmeklētāji gan satraukti spriež, vai aiz restēm ir īstais slepkava. Vai ļaunais slepkava joprojām varētu būt brīvībā?

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Bikrama joga tiek uzskatīta par pasaulē populārāko jogu, taču vairākas sievietes apgalvo, ka tās dibinātājs Bikrams Čoudharijs viņas seksuāli vajājis un pat uzbrucis. Kā šis vīrietis no dziednieka kļuva par seksuālu nezvēru?

programme.desc: Teda Helovīna plāni ar Džonu tiek izjaukti, Blēra piespiež viņu kļūt par viņas izraudzīto šoferi.

programme.desc: Blēra lūdz Metiju un Sūzenu ļaut Tedam būt par viņu laulību terapeitu; Sūzena turpina savu iepriekšējo karjeru.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Lilijai ir problēmas ar Mičela un Kamerona plāniem adoptēt vēl vienu bērnu.Džejs cenšas panākt, lai Menijs atzīstas medaljona zādzībā skolā. Klēra dara visu iespējamo, lai pierādītu, ka strīdā viņai bija taisnība.

programme.title: Teds
programme.desc: Teda Helovīna plāni ar Džonu tiek izjaukti, Blēra piespiež viņu kļūt par viņas izraudzīto šoferi.

programme.title: Teds
programme.desc: Blēra lūdz Metiju un Sūzenu ļaut Tedam būt par viņu laulību terapeitu; Sūzena turpina savu iepriekšējo karjeru.

programme.title: Teds
programme.desc: Metija neparastā Ziemassvētku vēlme tiek izpildīta, pilnībā mainot Beneta ģimenes noskaņu.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Dodoties lekciju tūrē uz citām Dunder Mifflin filiālēm, Maikls un Pema atklāj, ka Džima bijusī draudzene Kārena ir stāvoklī. Birojā Endijs savaldzina potenciālu klientu, bet Džims un Dvaits mēģina sarīkot Kellijas dzimšanas dienas ballīti.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Maikls un Pema dodas uz Našua un atklāj, ka Holijai ir jauns draugs. Birojā Džims un Dvaits cenšas izdomāt Kellijas dzimšanas dienas ballītes tēmu, un Andžela iegūst jaunu kaķi.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Maikls Valentīndienā birojā rīko vientuļu siržu ballīti, cerot, ka viņš sastapsies ar sievieti, kuru viņš satika agrāk, asins nodošanas laikā. Tikmēr Džims un Pema ietur neveiklas pusdienas kopā ar Filisu un Bobu Vansu.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Maikls gatavojas pamest Dunder Mifflin, paziņojot, ka izveidos savu papīra uzņēmumu. Vai viņam kāds pievienosies?

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Maikls ir sarūgtināts - viņš tiek pie jauna priekšnieka, kas darbosies kā starpposms starp viņu un Deividu Vollessu. Viņš kļūst vēl vairāk sarūgtinātāks, kad tiek izformēta ballītes plānošanas komiteja un atcelta Maikla piecpadsmitās jubilejas ballīte.

programme.title: Draugi

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Uzsākot beisbola karšu kolekcijonēšanu, Als un Stīvs pārdod Mārsijas veco lelli Bārbiju. Viņiem tā ir jāatgūst, bet viņi uzzina, ka veikals, kam viņi to pārdeva, ir aplaupīts, tāpēc viņiem būs jādodas uz Čikāgu, un jāiztaujā katrs bezpajumtnieks.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Valentīndienā Kellija sagādā kaudzi Valentīndienas aksesuāru, bet Stīvs plāno dāvināt Mārsijai ceļojumu uz Havaju salām. Kad Mārsija to no Pegijas uzzina, viņa izplāno uzdāvināt Stīvam dāvanu, izlecot no cilvēka izmēra kūkas. Pegija apdomā lēmumu par to, vai viņa saņems dāvanu, ko viņa vēlas no Ala - lai viņš pateiktu: "Es tevi mīlu".

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Als dzīvo ar domu, ka nav jāmaksā par neko, kas nav pasūtīts. Viņš ar Pegiju dodas uz greznu viesnīcu nedēļas nogales atpūtā, bet tikmēr pastnieks nejauši atstāj jaunu kredītkarti, kas adresēta sunim Bakam.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Valentīndienā Kellija sagādā kaudzi Valentīndienas aksesuāru, bet Stīvs plāno dāvināt Mārsijai ceļojumu uz Havaju salām. Kad Mārsija to no Pegijas uzzina, viņa izplāno uzdāvināt Stīvam dāvanu, izlecot no cilvēka izmēra kūkas. Pegija apdomā lēmumu par to, vai viņa saņems dāvanu, ko viņa vēlas no Ala - lai viņš pateiktu: "Es tevi mīlu".

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Slepus pārlūkojot Stīva un Mārsijas vēstules, Als un Pegija aizpilda pieteikumu televīzijas spēļu šovam "How Do I Love You", kura mērķis ir pārdzīvot fizisku spīdzināšanu no sava laulātā. Als un Pegija parādās šovā, izliekoties par Stīvu un Mārsiju, un viņi viegli iegūst daudzas balvas. Kad Stīvs un Mārsija to uzzina, viņi izliekas par Alu un Pegiju. Vīrs, kurš elektriskajā krēslā pārdzīvo visvairāk spīdzināšanas, iegūst jaunu automašīnu.

programme.title: Teds
programme.desc: Metija neparastā Ziemassvētku vēlme tiek izpildīta, pilnībā mainot Beneta ģimenes noskaņu.

programme.title: Teds
programme.desc: Tuvojoties mācību gada beigām, Teds plāno palīdzēt Džonam zaudēt nevainību.

programme.title: Smieklīgā sieviete
programme.desc: Džemma Artertone tēlo Blekpūlas skaistumkaralieni, kura dodas uz 60. gadu Londonu, lai īstenotu savus šovbiznesa sapņus.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Fils mēģina uzcelt mājiņu kokā. Heilija cīnās ar koledžas iestāšanās esejas rakstīšanu. Kamerons meklē sievieti, lai uzvarētu derībās ar Mičelu. Džejs nevēlas dejot salsu kopā ar Gloriju un citu pāri.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Ģimenei vācot preces citai ģimenei, kuru māja nodega, Džejs masāžas laikā izsaka apkaunojošu piezīmi Filam. Klēra ir greizsirdīga par Mičela draudzību ar Gloriju, savukārt Kamerons cīnās ar busiņu autostāvvietā.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Fils ir sarūgtināts, ka Klēra slāpē viņa radošumu. Mičels netic Kamerona stāstam par "punkin chunkin". Glorija neļaus Džejam pateikt Menijam, ka viņa Pateicības dienas centrālais elements ir briesmīgs. Heilija un Alekss iekļūst avārijā.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Fils ir sarūgtināts, ka Klēra slāpē viņa radošumu. Mičels netic Kamerona stāstam par "punkin chunkin". Glorija neļaus Džejam pateikt Menijam, ka viņa Pateicības dienas centrālais elements ir briesmīgs. Heilija un Alekss iekļūst avārijā.

programme.title: Amerikāņu ģimenīte
programme.desc: Pēc ārsta apmeklējuma, bet nokavējis zvanu par testa rezultātiem, Fils automātiski izdara pārsteidzīgus secinājumus un sāk atvadīties. Havjers atkal bez brīdinājuma parādās un aizved Meniju uz zirgu skriešanās sacīkstēm, kā dāvanu dzimšanas dienā.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Debra mēģina iemācīties atdarināt Marijas slavenās kotletes.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Raimonds iztaujā Debru par budžetu un saka, ka viņš var labāk, tāpēc viņa ļauj viņam iesaistīties. Pēc dažām nedēļām Rejs pārskaita čekus, un viņam ir 300 dolāru pārtēriņš. Viņš izveido viltotu čeku grāmatiņu, lai dokumentos viss izskatās labi.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Rejs ķircina Robertu par viņa darbu policijā, tādēļ Roberts uzaicina viņu braukt līdzi patruļā. Rejs saņem vairāk, nekā viņš gaidīja, liekot viņam aplūkot Robertu jaunā gaismā.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Rejs un Debra nespēj izgulēties. Iemesls tam ir Allija, kas sākusi gulēt viņu gultā.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Rejs uzzinājis, ka Marijai patīk Eimija vairāk nekā Debra, jo viņa ir "labā" meitene.

programme.desc: Maikls un Pema sāk savu pirmo dienu Maikla Skota papīra uzņēmumā, apvienojot pārējos darbiniekus un cenšoties savākt naudu.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Sāk parādīties spriedze un vilšanās, Maiklam, Pemai un Raienam pārceļot Maikla Skota papīra uzņēmumu uz šauru "darba vietu" biznesa parkā.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Maikls atgriežas Dunder Mifflin un prezentē Raienu un Pemu kā pārdevējus, taču esošie pārdevēji pieprasa, lai Maikls atdod viņiem nozagtos klientus. Tikmēr daži darbinieki ideju par piektdienas vienkāršību uztver pārlieku nopietni.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Maikls mēģina radīt telpu, kur izbēgt no darba, to radot noliktavā, kas tika izmantota Maikla Skota papīra uzņēmumam. Džims un Pema apsver ideju aizbēgt un apprecēties šajā pat dienā.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Pēc došanās ar Stīvu uz sacensībām Als nevēlas atklāt, ka laimējis 1200 dolārus, jo zina, ka Pegija un bērni paņems naudu sev. Kamēr Als mēģina atvairīt Pegijas aizdomas par seksu, Stīvs pieprasa arvien pārbagātākus kukuļus par Ala laimestiem, lai viņš turētu muti par naudu.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Slepus pārlūkojot Stīva un Mārsijas vēstules, Als un Pegija aizpilda pieteikumu televīzijas spēļu šovam "How Do I Love You", kura mērķis ir pārdzīvot fizisku spīdzināšanu no sava laulātā. Vīrs, kurš elektriskajā krēslā pārdzīvo visvairāk spīdzināšanas, iegūst jaunu automašīnu.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Pēc došanās ar Stīvu uz sacensībām Als nevēlas atklāt, ka laimējis 1200 dolārus, jo zina, ka Pegija un bērni paņems naudu sev. Kamēr Als mēģina atvairīt Pegijas aizdomas par seksu, Stīvs pieprasa arvien pārbagātākus kukuļus par Ala laimestiem, lai viņš turētu muti par naudu.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Al klusie trīs dienu nedēļas nogales plāni noskatīties viņa iecienīto Džona Veina filmu "Hondo" tiek sabojāti - Pegijas ekscentriskie radinieki ierodas apciemot Bandijus. Radinieki - viņas neredzētā, resnā māte, onkuļi druknais Ērvins un sievišķīgais Oto, kā arī dziedošu un dejojošu radu trio. Als pārtrauc un sabojā romantisko vakaru starp Stīvu un Mārsiju, lai izstāstītu par savām problēmām.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Als atrod bibliotēkas grāmatu, kuras nodošanas termiņš bija 1957. gadā. Viņam tā jāatdod bibliotēkā un jāsastopas ar savām ļaunākajām bērnības bailēm: bibliotekāriem.

programme.title: Mesjē Speids
programme.desc: Speids aptaujā ekscentriskus kaimiņus un uzzina par noslēpumainā zēna talantiem. Terēza turpina izmeklēšanu vienatnē, bet Žans Pjērs risina pagātnes problēmas un satiek Filipu.

programme.title: Mesjē Speids
programme.desc: Ir 1963. gads, un leģendārais detektīvs Sems Speids bauda pensijas gadus Francijas dienvidos, tomēr baumas par sena ienaidnieka atgriešanos izjauc šo idilli.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Karls Albergs pārceļas uz klusu piekrastes pilsētiņu, jo ir noguris no policijas darba lielpilsētā. Tomēr viņam nākas izmantot visas prasmes, lai izmeklētu slepkavības, kas arvien turpina notikt.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Lēdija Tresiliana negribīgi rīko viesības savā Devonas īpašumā. Miss Mārpla, sena lēdijas Tresilianas draudzene, ir ieintriģēta, kad dzird stāstu par bērnu slepkavu, kas tā arī netika notiesāts.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Elīza tiek nolīgta, lai atrisināju šantāžas lietu Viktorijas laikmeta medicīnas iestādē, un sastop jaunu konkurentu, kas vēlas viņu nolīgt vai izspiest no tirgus.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Sigfrīds saņem nepatīkamus jaunumus, un Helēna redz, cik smagi Džeimss strādā, taču viņa nevēlas viņam palīdzēt, lūdzot savam tēvam izpildīt nepopulāro TB testēšanas shēmu.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Peregrīna slepenībā nonāk īpaši slepenā zinātnes iestādē pēc tam, kad viens no tās darbiniekiem, vecs Birdie biedrs, tiek atrasts līdz nāvei sasalis avarējušā automašīnā.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad laboratorijā tiek noslepkavota viņu galvenā aizdomās turamā doktore Eleina Montgomerija, Peregrīna un Džeimss ir spiesti redzēt, ka viņu slepkavas motīvi ir daudz dziļāki, nekā viņi abi bija uzdrošinājušies uzskatīt.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Džeimsam jāpieņem svarīgs lēmums par savu nākotni Daroubijā. Tikmēr Tristana nākamās darbības nosaka nejauša tikšanās ar negaidītu svešinieku.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Džeimss un Helēna apšauba savu kopīgo nākotni līdz Ziemassvētkiem, tikmēr Daroubijas iemīļotākā dzīvnieka situācija šķiet pavisam nopietna.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: 1939. gada pavasaris: Tristans ir kvalificēts veterinārārsts, un Džeimss uzsāk jaunu dzīves posmu ar Helēnu. Tomēr tā kā karš glūn ap stūri, visiem ir jāapsver sava loma Darovbijā un ne tikai.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Sākoties izmaiņām Skeldale House, visi cenšas saprasties, kā vien var, un Helēna ir ievākusies augšstāva istabā ar Džeimsu.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Sigfrīds saņem nepatīkamus jaunumus, un Helēna redz, cik smagi Džeimss strādā, taču viņa nevēlas viņam palīdzēt, lūdzot savam tēvam izpildīt nepopulāro TB testēšanas shēmu.

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Džūditas pagātnes noslēpums var tikt atklāts, un trijotnei ir jāpaspēj notvert slepkava, pirms nav par vēlu.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Karls Albergs pārceļas uz klusu piekrastes pilsētiņu, jo ir noguris no policijas darba lielpilsētā. Tomēr viņam nākas izmantot visas prasmes, lai izmeklētu slepkavības, kas arvien turpina notikt.

programme.title: Dalgliešs
programme.desc: Advokāte Venīša Aldridža panāk Garija Eša attaisnošanu, viņš ir aizdomās turamais savas tantes noslepkavošanā. Venīšas attiecības ar kolēģiem ir saspīlētas, tad viņa tiek atrasta mirusi pie galda.

programme.title: Grāmattārps
programme.desc: Harkapa nāves izmeklēšana turpinās, un Buks atklāj kaut ko pārsteidzošu par izrakumos atrasto skeletu. Viņam būs nepieciešama liela atjautība, lai atrisinātu šīs lietas.

programme.title: Komisārs Megrē
programme.desc: Šī ir jauna adaptācija Žorža Simeona stāstiem par iemīļoto franču detektīvu Žilu Megrē, kuru atveido pats Rovans Atkinsons.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Albergs un Gibsonas policijas nodaļa strādā, lai atrastu vainīgo, kad Kasandra nonāk dzīvībai bīstamā situācijā.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Lēdija Tresiliana negribīgi rīko viesības savā Devonas īpašumā. Miss Mārpla, sena lēdijas Tresilianas draudzene, ir ieintriģēta, kad dzird stāstu par bērnu slepkavu, kas tā arī netika notiesāts.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Mis Mārpla priekšā lielākais izaicinājums, kad viņa saņem norādījumus no drauga izmeklēt iespējamu noziegumu, bet nezina, kas tas ir par noziegumu.

programme.title: Grāmattārps
programme.desc: Harkapa nāves izmeklēšana turpinās, un Buks atklāj kaut ko pārsteidzošu par izrakumos atrasto skeletu. Viņam būs nepieciešama liela atjautība, lai atrisinātu šīs lietas.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Pēc modeles Bārbijas Džounsas un modes dizaineres Florences Astores dubultslepkavībām Peregrīna izmanto savas nepārbaudītās un neparastās prasmes, lai mēģinātu notvert viņu slepkavu, pirms viņi atkal uzbrūk.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Popzvaigzne un viņa rezerves dejotājs tiek nosisti ar elektrību, izpildot triku televīzijas mūzikas šovā, un Peregrīnas objektivitāte tiek pārbaudīta, kad viņas vecais draugs Ēriks tiek nosaukts par galveno aizdomās turamo šajā lietā.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Lietai pret Ēriku pieaugot, Peregrīna pārliecina viņu atklāties par pagātnes noziegumu, kas attīrīs viņa vārdu par slepkavībām, un Violetas apslēptie talanti pakļauj viņu un Peregrīnu briesmām.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Peregrīna slepenībā nonāk īpaši slepenā zinātnes iestādē pēc tam, kad viens no tās darbiniekiem, vecs Birdie biedrs, tiek atrasts līdz nāvei sasalis avarējušā automašīnā.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad laboratorijā tiek noslepkavota viņu galvenā aizdomās turamā doktore Eleina Montgomerija, Peregrīna un Džeimss ir spiesti redzēt, ka viņu slepkavas motīvi ir daudz dziļāki, nekā viņi abi bija uzdrošinājušies uzskatīt.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Lēdija Tresiliana negribīgi rīko viesības savā Devonas īpašumā. Miss Mārpla, sena lēdijas Tresilianas draudzene, ir ieintriģēta, kad dzird stāstu par bērnu slepkavu, kas tā arī netika notiesāts.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Pēdējā sērijā Elīza atklāj, kurš un kāpēc nogalināja viņas tēvu. Galvenais aizdomās turamais ir Mozus, tomēr atklājas, ka īstais slepkava visu laiku ir bijis Hercoga acu priekšā.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Kādas pazudušas sievietes meita nolīgst Elizu viņu atrast. Kad lietu slēdz policija, starp Elizu un Hercogu rodas jauni saspīlējumi.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Nozagta vērtīga Čārlza Dārvina skice, un apdrošināšanas uzņēmums noalgo Elizu to atrast, taču drīz atklājas pavērsiens.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Eliza piespiedu kārtā slēpjas, kad kļūst par galveno aizdomās turamo, kad pilsētas morgos notiek vairākas ielaušanās. Hercogs mēģina atrast citus aizdomās turamos, Eliza griežas pēc Mozus palīdzības.

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Pārsteidzoša saikne ar kādu pazuduša cilvēka lietu liek no jauna paskatīties uz vietējiem iedzīvotājiem, tomēr, vai kāds no viņiem tiešām varētu būt izdarījis slepkavību?

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Kad tiek nogalināts burāšanas kluba loceklis, Džūdita, Beka un Sjūzija ir spiestas tikt galā ar sarūgtinājumu mazajā kopienā, lai noskaidrotu patiesību.

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Tiek atklāti rīcības motīvi, un slepkava sūta vēl vienu brīdinājumu Džūditai, Bekai un Sjūzijai, kam jādara viss iespējamais, lai pēc iespējas ātrāk atrisinātu lietu.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Bijušais detektīvs Karls Albergs pārceļas uz nelielu piekrastes pilsētiņu, lai rastu mierinājumu un saskaras ar virkni slepkavību. Iedzīvotāja slepkavībā Albergs aizdomās tur citu vietējo iedzīvotāju.

programme.title: Slepkavība mazpilsētā
programme.desc: Karls Albergs pārceļas uz klusu piekrastes pilsētiņu, jo ir noguris no policijas darba lielpilsētā. Tomēr viņam nākas izmantot visas prasmes, lai izmeklētu slepkavības, kas arvien turpina notikt.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mērdokam ir aizdomas, ka sievietes nāve ir saistīta ar korumpētu mēra kandidātu, kam, iespējams, iepriekš izdevies izvairīties no atbildības par slepkavību.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mērdoka izmeklēšana par noslēpumainu slepkavību var būt saistīta ar jaunu ēstuvi, kurā Higinss un Roberts ieguldījuši līdzekļus.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Izmeklējot noduršanas gadījumu, Mērdoks un Brekenrīds nejauši atklāj spiega Terensa Meijersa slepeno civilo dzīvi.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Mērdoks un Brakenreids ir pārsteigti, kad "Hamleta" aktieris viņu acu priekšā nomirst uz skatuves.

programme.title: Dalgliešs
programme.desc: Muzeja direktors Markuss Dupeins cenšas pārliecināt brāli Nevilu parakstīt muzeja jauno īres līgumu. Muzejs ir ģimenes mantojums. Automašīnai aizdegoties, Nevils pēkšņi mirst.

programme.title: Mesjē Speids
programme.desc: Speids aptaujā ekscentriskus kaimiņus un uzzina par noslēpumainā zēna talantiem. Terēza turpina izmeklēšanu vienatnē, bet Žans Pjērs risina pagātnes problēmas un satiek Filipu.

programme.title: Mesjē Speids
programme.desc: Ir 1963. gads, un leģendārais detektīvs Sems Speids bauda pensijas gadus Francijas dienvidos, tomēr baumas par sena ienaidnieka atgriešanos izjauc šo idilli.

programme.title: Hārdakri
programme.desc: Šis ir stāsts par strādnieku šķiras ģimenes Hārdakru dzīvi, mīlestību un ceļu uz bagātību 19. gs. beigu Jorkšīrā.

programme.title: Sisi
programme.desc: Seriāla noslēdzošajā sezonā Austrijas ķeizariene Sisi turpina dzīvot starp ilgām pēc brīvības un pienākumiem pret impēriju. Pēc Korfu pārciesta smaga kritiena no zirga Sisi atgriežas vecāku māja Posenhofenā. Pēc tēva nāves atklājas ģimenes noslēpumi, un Sisi nākas cīnīties par ģimenes īpašuma saglabāšanu. Tikmēr Francis gaida Sisi atgriešanos galmā. Starp abiem briest jaunas nesaskaņas. Vai viņu mīlestību vēl būs iespējams glābt?

programme.title: Sisi
programme.desc: Seriāla noslēdzošajā sezonā Austrijas ķeizariene Sisi turpina dzīvot starp ilgām pēc brīvības un pienākumiem pret impēriju. Pēc Korfu pārciesta smaga kritiena no zirga Sisi atgriežas vecāku māja Posenhofenā. Pēc tēva nāves atklājas ģimenes noslēpumi, un Sisi nākas cīnīties par ģimenes īpašuma saglabāšanu. programme.title: Golden Trail Ledro Sky Trentino | Day
European Qualifiers 2026. Portugal - Republic of Ireland
Почта
programme.desc: В почтовое отделение на должность экспедитора устраивается Елена (40 лет). Экспедитор Андрей (45) не очень доволен новой напарницей, он не доверяет женщинам за рулем. Но со временем между Еленой и Андреем возникает симпатия. И не без стараний со стороны их детей – Юли и Глеба. Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

programme.title: Новенькая
programme.desc: В элитную школу для детей богатых родителей попадает Вера - девушка из обычной семьи. Она сразу оказывается в центре запутанной детективной интриги и школьных конфликтов, и, конечно же, романтической истории. Но все не так просто: у Веры также есть тайна, и в элитном заведении она оказалась случайно...

Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

programme.title: Новенькая
programme.desc: В элитную школу для детей богатых родителей попадает Вера - девушка из обычной семьи. Она сразу оказывается в центре запутанной детективной интриги и школьных конфликтов, и, конечно же, романтической истории. Но все не так просто: у Веры также есть тайна, и в элитном заведении она оказалась случайно...
